choices: A door opens, reaviling a humanoid robot
The computer logs you off of Sara's user account
1.content:
Your sister Sara is out of town this week at a big science convention and she has entrusted you to look after her house while she's gone. Sara has always been a big nerd when it comes to electronic gizmos and computer stuff. She’s the only one you know that could get excited over a whole week of droning lectures on astrophysics or whatever they talk about during those convention things. You figure it’s not a big deal so you pack a bunch of clothes into a backpack and head on over.

You open the door and see the living room is a bit of a mess, but that’s Sara for you. There are magazines across the coffee table, the couch is a mess, and DVDs scattered on the floor. You’re amazed that someone could live like this. You toss your backpack on to the coffee table and try not to step on leftover gadgets and pieces of Sara’s experiments.

In almost a flash Sara greets you wearing a nice summer dress while holding two bags of luggage. She gives you a rundown of things to do and its the usual stuff: collect the mail, water the plants out front, don’t open the small metal circuit breaker looking plate in the wall …ok, that last bit is oddly cryptic but before you can inquire about it she’s already out the door.

So, now you’re left to your own devices and quickly become bored. You flip on the tv but can’t find much to fill your interest which brings your eyes to the movie cases on the floor. You begin sifting through her DVDs for something to watch but come up with either documentaries or chick flicks. You really aren’t up for a video on the intricacies of systems engineering nor do you wish to watch “The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants.” The magazines on the table suffer from the same affliction, “Popular Science” and “Glamour Magazine”…you’d swear two different people live in this house.

As a last resort, you pop out your GameBoy and play for a bit, maybe 15 minutes in you see it’s almost out of power. You sigh remembering you forgot to charge it last time you used it Grabbing the charger, you look for an outlet. You come a crossed one easily enough and as you stand you notice the small metal plate. You debate with yourself if you should open it or not, eventually saying, “Why not?”

You grab the cold handle and open it revealing a large lever and, figuring you’ve come this far, you attempt to flip it down but about halfway down it gets stuck. After a few tugs, you decide to get it unstuck. You jump up and put all you’re weight on it on your way down and as you come down so does the lever, which then snaps in your hands.

“Oops…”

The lights dim as the sound of grinding metal fills the room. You really wish that lever didn’t snap off. Luckily it doesn’t take long before things seem to be working normally again. You sigh in relief that the house didn’t blow up but you are startled at the sound of a computerized voice.

*Good morning, Sara.*
1.title: Miss Identified

Though startled and a bit taken aback you still quickly respond "I'm not Sara, I'm her brother, Tom."

Immediately the computerized voice responds with an obnoxious

*ERROR*

"I already told you, I'm not Sara!"

*ERROR*
11.title: I'm not Sara

111.content:
You think to yourself that this could be pretty cool even if it keeps calling you by your sister’s name. You begin pacing while thinking of what you would like CARA, wherever it is, to do. An idea comes to you when you accidentally stumble on some of the junk that Sara has around.

“CARA, Clean the house.”

*Yes, Sara*

*Cleaning Mode Initiated*

You notice long robotic arms enter the room from small panels in the walls which hastily begin sorting the items and cleaning the room. At least that explains why CARA couldn’t answer your question about its location, it appears that Sara has turned the entire house into a robot, Awesome.

Amused, you watch the arms do there work on stacking the DVD and vacuuming the floor with special attachments.

You laugh, “Man, Sara is a genius. When she gets this thing to 100% I’m gonna want one, preferably one that calls me by my name.”

You’re amusement ends when you see an arm grab your backpack. You quickly run over and try and get it back but the arm refuses to release it from its grasp.

“Hey, let go!” The arm doesn’t seem to hear you as it continues to attempt to move the backpack. One quick yank and your hands are forced to let go and the pack swiftly disappears into the wall.

*Cleaning Mode Complete*

“Hey, where did you take my backpack?!”

*All stained items are to be washed*

“It wasn’t stained!”

*ERROR*

You attempt to keep your cool, “Return my backpack.”

*All stained items are to be washed, the voice repeats, much to your aggravation.*

“Look, It has all my clothes in it, without it, I’ll have nothing to wear.” Look at you, you are trying to reason with a robotic house.

*Incorrect*

“What do you mean incorrect?”

*You have an adequate number of clothes in your closet, Sara.*

You are really beginning to become annoyed by this whole thing. It has quickly gone from being fun to being a big pain. You calm yourself again and realize that you can just return home and pick up a few more things. Though you begin wondering if you’d come back, you promised your sister that you’d watch the house. Then again, you didn’t know about CARA when you made that promise. Maybe there could be a way to turn it off?
111.title: CARA, clean the house

might as well do what it says
1111.content:
Your stomach growls as you debate with yourself what you should do next and you almost absentmindedly say, "I'm getting kind of hungry maybe I should grab an early lun-"

Before you can finish your train of thought, CARA cuts you off.

*Very well, Sara*

*Meal preparations initiated*

You can just make out the familiar sight of the metal arms busy at work threw the doorway to the kitchen. Though you were planning on picking up something on your way back to your place, you think that it couldn't hurt to see if this thing can cook anything remotely editable. Why pay for something you can get for free, right?

You keep your distance in fear of what those arms might do, but it looks like everything is under control. It's not long until your plate is set at the table and you see and arm pull out a chair.

*Meal preparations complete*

*Please have a seat, Sara*

You walk over to the table to inspect the dish when you feel an arm force you onto the chair firmly. The suddenness catches you off guard and you plop onto the wooden seat then speedily slid into the table. You are a bit uncomfortable and the wooden arms of the chair make it almost impossible to move about.

Your eyes then drift back to your meal.

You look at the plate that’s in front of you and notice what seems to be yet another part of CARA’s programming that was left unfinished. An attempt at toast with a side of eggs was obviously made, however, the result was less than appetizing. The toast was burnt to a crisp and the egg looked like it hadn’t even been cooked, there were even pieces of the egg’s shell on the plate. The only thing that looks alright was a glass of orange juice.

Attempting to put a bit of distance between you and the plate, you find that the arm that tucked you into your current position has not moved and will not allow you an easy way out.

*Please enjoy your meal*

With that, you see an arm that appears to have some kind of fork attachment snake past your shoulder and head to your plate. After removing a chunk of toasted bread, the arm dips it into the raw egg then turns it toward you.

Before the end can get to your face you grab the fork and attempt to wrestle it away. With quick jerking motions, the arm gets closer. Fear wells up inside you as the severity of the moment hits you. Sure the food is gross but you can just deal with that, the real problem is that these arms can be pretty forceful, and this one is holding something sharp at the end.

With newfound strength, you fight off the metal menace. You hear the sound of grinding metal as the arm tries to fight off your efforts to overcome it. It feels like you have been fighting forever as your arms burn with exertion. You worry that you won’t be able to fight much more when in the thrashing about you manage to knock the glass of orange juice over, which spills over the table, on to your shirt and into your lap.

Suddenly the arm you’ve been combating stops and you feel a bit of pride at warding of your assailant. There is a pause from CARA, perhaps thinking? You attempt to leave your seat again but still face resistance from your chair. You try to squeeze out instead but you’re packed in too tight. Feeling a bit claustrophobic you begin shouting commands for letting you go, but nothing happens.

“Well, nothing else worked. Uh…CARA, clean kitchen,” hoping for the best.

*Yes, Sara.*

*Cleaning Mode Initiated*

Quickly arms fill the room with cleaning attachments and begin scrubbing up the mess. The food is removed and the spill is wiped from the table. One with a sponge twists toward you, but you’re too tired to fight it off this time, but luckily it just dabs the excess liquid off. They eventually finish and go back to their little holes in the wall.

*Cleaning Mode Complete*

With the arm holding the chair gone you jump out of your seat, relieved at your returned mobility.

*Please make your way to the bathroom to be cleaned*
1111.title: I’m getting kind of hungry

11111.content:
"That's IT!" You yell, more than a bit perturbed. Your clothes and everything else in your backpack has been stolen by CARA, you're hungry, and the clothes you do have are now dripping with cold orange juice. You want to get out of here now, forget your responsibilities. You walk up to the door and attempt to open it, however, it appears locked.

"What the..."

*Please make your way to the bathroom to be cleaned*

"Did you lock the door?"

*Yes, Sara*

"Why?!"

*For safety measures, I have locked the doors and windows to prevent possible break-ins or forced entry while you are in the bathroom*

"Forget about that, unlock the door."

*ERROR*

*Please make your way to the bathroom to be cleaned*

"No! Open this door now!"

There is a short pause before you get a response.

*Are you in need of assistance?*

"This has gone far enough," you think to yourself. You reach into your pocket and pull out your phone, while mentally preparing yourself for what's to come next. You figure, "she'll get over it and she shouldn't have made the thing so mysterious, I couldn't help but be curious so, in a way, it's her fault!"

*Are you in need of assistance?* CARA repeats

You dial the number and hear it ring then you hear something else upstairs your sister's ringtone. "That ditz! She forgot her phone."

You close your phone and put it back in your pocket. You think that maybe she'll call from a payphone to check up or something, you'll just have to wait.

Suddenly you get an idea; maybe you can get out with some outside assistance. You bring out your phone once more, but this time call your roommate Jason.

Jason's not too sharp but he's a nice enough guy and at the moment he's the only one you can think of.

After a few rings, you hear a groggy Jason on the other side "Hello?"

"Jason, it's me"
"Me who?"
"Check your phone"
There is a short pause "Hey, Tom. What's up?"
"I need your help, there's this" you stop yourself from talking about CARA. Would he believe it, you have no idea, but if he did he might not come over to help. "I, uh, need some spare clothes."

*Are you in need of assistance?*

"Who's that?" you hear Jason ask.

"What?"

"Who's the girl there? Is that your sister? I thought you said she was leaving. You know, you never did introduce me to her is she cute?"

"Dude, just get over here with some clothes, there should be a spare key in a red flowerpot out front. Do you remember where it is? I left the address on my dresser"

"Yea I remember. Do you really need clothes right now?"

*Are you in need of assistance?*

"Yes, you Nimrod!"

*Very well. I will assist you, Sara*

You realize at that moment that you have not been paying attention to CARA and your eyes widen as you hear the sound of the house coming alive again.

"Whatever, I'll bring some later, if I feel like it." You hear Jason say, obviously a bit mad at being called names, followed by the phone ending the call.
11111.title: Try to leave but the front door is locked.

111111.content:
You quickly put your phone away and try to think of a way out of this situation but multiple arms reach out and start grabbing you before you come up with anything. If one arm was incredibly tough to fight off then anymore would be impossible, but you still struggle for your freedom. You shout as many different commands for it to stop that you can think of, but your cries are either not heard or simply ignored. You are dragged up the stairs and passed around like a football, it's more than a little disorienting.

http://dayeandknight.deviantart.com/art/...

You eventually find yourself standing in your sister's bathroom as the arms withdraw and close the bathroom door behind them.

The room looks pretty clean, the smell of flowers invades you nose.

*Cleansing Preparation Beginning*

The bathtub immediately begins to fill with water and you notice oils and other liquids being added to the water. You lean over the tub and sniff, the smell is fruity, pleasant but obviously girly and the water is beginning to suds up with bubbles.

As you gaze at the hypnotic bubbles you feel a pressure on your waist. As you look down you see a metal arm has made its way under you and began undoing your belt. Before you can attempt to slap it away something behind you pulls your shirt over your head. You fight to keep it on, but as your arms are raised, you pants are lowered. You give up on the shirt, letting a metal arm disappear with it so you can bring your full attention to you pants. You grab the waist line of your pants and pull as hard as you can, but with no luck. More arms appear and begin leaning you backwards, causing your arms to leap out to catch yourself from falling, however the arms keep you from hitting the ground. As your legs are in the air, the arms have no trouble pulling your pants, boxers, shoes and socks from you.

You are finally placed in the warm water, thankfully its not scolding or freezing.

*Cleansing Preparation Complete*

Sitting in the water you try to calm your nerves but you are not given a chance to breathe before everything comes alive once more.

*Cleansing Beginning*

A glass door cuts off the tub from the rest of the bathroom and two arms come out of the walls. They each have what appears to be a luffa at the ends which quickly connects with your skin. You can’t help but feel vulnerable as the sponges begin sudsing up and rubbing you. Three more arms appear, one with that pours some shampoo onto your head and the others work it into your long hair.

After you back has been thoroughly scrubbed you are leaned back so that you are submerged from your shoulders down. You feel the sensual body massage you are getting, and with all the girly smells you are being bombarded with, you become aroused. You close your eyes and let your body relax, submitting to the sensations. Images of women touching you intimately flood your mind. Your arms are lifted one at a time and each are cleaned in great detail. You smile to yourself when your legs are lifted and rubbed down, hoping that “all” of your body will be given such detail. With your legs in the air you feel arms begin to move down your thighs and gently touch your member and you are in heaven. They don’t linger, much your dismay, and start working on the backside of your thighs.

You start to feel a bit uncomfortable as your fantasy begins to shift. Here you are, on your back with your legs in the air, strong arms rubbing your backside, feminine scents everywhere, so its no wonder that you begin picturing yourself being advanced upon by a male lover and you as his womanly conquest. The thought is enough to snap you out of your daydream in time to see a set of new arms in the room with razors on the ends. Your legs have be lathered and prepped to be shaved. 1111111.content:
The floor is cold. You can almost feel the heat from your legs retreat to the linoleum panels under you. You look longingly at the wall where one of CARA's appendages made off with your clothes. Slowly you exit the bathroom and replay the past two hours in your head.

You think to yourself about how you could get your self out of this. You think, maybe you could try to call Jason again and plead for his help. Of course, the plan is dashed when you come to the realization that your phone is still in your pants pockets, which is probably in the rinse cycle right now. You remember, however, that your sister's phone is still in the house.

There are limited options to choose from when it comes to exploring, but you find yourself in your sister's room and luckily her phone is on her dresser. You pick up the phone and start to dial when something comes to your attention. Its been a while since you've actually dialed his number. You've become accustomed to simply finding his name on your cell's call list for a good year now, at least. You get about three numbers in and then your mind goes blank.

You sit on the bed and put your head in your hands, feeling powerless. The softness for your face and body is more than a bit upsetting and you can tell you have a light girly scent on your skin. You take a deep breath and try to clear your head.

"Ok, my stuff was taken," you say to yourself. "I've been upstairs as well as downstairs and I haven't seen any sign of them. Maybe there is a laundry room in the basement or something." You stand now feeling your confidence returning.

"I'll just go down there, grab something so I'm not naked and make a break for it. I'll walk home if I have to, sorry Sara but I've had it with this place." You are just about ready to put your plan into action when CARA speaks up.

*You do not need to worry about your clothes, Sara. As I have stated earlier, you still have clean clothes available.*

Your heart begins to race as you hear the familiar sound of shifting metal associated with CARA manhandling you.

*What would you like to wear, Sara?*

111111111.content:
After a bit of searching, you find the door to the basement then cautiously open it. Looking around, you are unable to find a light switch so you grab a banister and begin to go down. The wooden steps creak under your weight as you take careful steps into the darkened basement. You make it to the bottom without a problem but keep a firm grip on the railing while trying to make out anything in the shadows.

As if reading your mind, the room begins to hum and a faint glow appears above you. The fluorescent bulbs slowly reveal a room with a bunch of bulky objects covered by white sheets. There appears to be a large workbench with a wall covered in tools and what looks like unfinished robotic arms propped against a wall. There's even a big table with a bunch of beakers, test tubes, and everything else you'd come to expect from a mad scientist lab, next to a refrigerator. Cautiously you investigate the room and come to the conclusion that these large objects must have been former projects that Sara had been working on at one point or another.

It's then that you spot a computer on the table with the beakers as the monitor comes to life. You sit down in a chair and wait for the computer to finish booting up. When it looks like its done, you start clicking away in hopes that you might be able to find some kind of shut down program for CARA. Sadly, the computer isn't very user friendly. You end up clicking on something that you think might help but all it does is turn on something under one of the sheets. CARA, perhaps thinking that this is what you want to work on, removes the white sheet. Under the sheet looks to be a water cooler.

'CARA, what is this?'

*It is a water cooler, Sara.*

'Yea, I got that, but why is it down here?'

*I do not know.*

You really should know better by now, but you grab an empty glass near the beakers, place it under the nozzle, then reach out and press down the blue tap for cold water. What comes out is anything but cold as steam and hot water sprays out. You jump back to avoid the splash. The glass tumbles to the ground and shatters on impact.

'Well, I guess that's why it's down here.' you remark as CARA begins cleaning up the mess.

*You appear to be having trouble getting your drink, I shall assist you.* Nothing good can come from this, you realize, as CARA begins the same processes you just finish. CARA pours a glass filled with the hot water then presents it to you, noticing your hesitation the glass flys to your mouth before you can back away. Scolding water meets your lips as well as the tip of your tongue and you jump back from the pain and yelp.

*Sara, you've burned yourself.*

*Medical Procedure Commencing*

CARA quickly opens the fridge and takes an ice pack then wraps it in a cloth which then finds its way to your lips. The pain from the burn subsides a bit as another arm provides what looks to be some kind of cream. A dab of it is scooped up and spread on your sensitive lips. Any pain quickly fades away as you are left there with swelling, pouty lips.

*Medical Procedure Complete*
111111111.title: A little look, a little burn

With that latest assault, you head back to the computer with new determination to shut down CARA. You tell your self that this is going to end now but then CARA chimes in.

*There is someone on your porch, Sara.*

'What? Who?'

The computer screen goes black then quickly switches to a video feed that shows a young man. You realize that it's your friend Jason. You hear him start knocking on the door so you rush up the stairs. When you reach the top you head to the door but stop in mid-stride. You look down at your self, remembering how you are dressed.

'I can't let Jason see me dressed like this.' you say to yourself.

*Understood, Sara. You wish to look more attractive for this young man. Your romantic intentions have been noted.*

*A profile has been made for 'Jason'.*

*Please head to your room.*

'What?! Wait! No!' How could things go so wrong so fast? When will you learn to keep your big mouth shut?

*Do not worry, Sara. I'm sure when we make you more presentable, Jason will find you lovely.*

With that, The familiar robotic arms lead you forcibly up to Sara's room. In a whirlwind of motion, you are stripped of all clothing and your new outfit is forced upon you. A pair of lacy black panties and a matching black push-up bra are slipped on your frame. The blue bra kind of made you appear to have breasts but the push-up bra leaves your chest very feminine.

You are sat on Sara's bed and the arms go to town on your face, hair, and nails. You can't really see anything but you can feel the cold nail polish administered to you hands and feet while combs and scissors attack your hair, giving you a very feminine style. Brushes and powders lightly dust your face as your eyebrows are painfully plucked into thin pretty arches. The smell of all the hair spray, powders, and polish overwhelm your senses. Your eyelashes are curled and coated and lipstick meets your mouth. You know the weight the lipstick puts on your lips makes them look even more full and kissable without even needing to see your reflection.

Black pantyhose are slid up your legs, sending chills all over your body. Brought back to your feet, your arms are lifted and something loose is gently placed over your head with CARA taking care not to ruin your hair and makeup. You are now wearing a black, long sleeve, knee-length dress with a dark blue floral pattern along the skirt. Finally, three-inch black heels are placed on your feet.

1111111111.title: Jason shows up and you need to look your best

11111111111.content:
Here you are, standing in the middle of your sister's bedroom. Your friend is standing outside, expecting you to open the door and you are wearing a dress and a pair of high heels. It was just this morning that you were sitting around feeling bored. Man, do you miss being bored right now.

Your eyes drift across the room, stopping at a mirror. The face you see is quite the vision, you just can't believe you could look as pretty as you do. Angling your head, taking in the changes CARA forced upon you, it's hard to take your gaze away from the reflection. You can see yourself under the hair and makeup but you really have to try. Under your skirt, you can feel yourself become aroused by the image of the girl that you have become. From her big, beautiful eyes, to that hair with a strand that she brushes sexily behind her ear, to those lips that are just begging to be kissed and made to wrap lovingly around a WHAT ARE YOU SAYING? You realize that your hand had made its way under your dress and has been rubbing your hardening crotch. You pull yourself away from the image of your beautiful face and try to get your head straight.

There are a thousand different thoughts dashing around in your head. Should you just wait for Jason to leave and then make another attempt at getting out of here? If you do that, should you try to get CARA to get something else for you to wear or make do looking as you do? CARA should be done washing your stuff soon so that you could at least be in your own clothes. With the luck you've had so far, however, that seems unlikely.

You could have CARA let Jason in so you could at least have someone else that might be able to help you out.

That's when a distasteful idea comes to mind. CARA is under the impression that you want to... be with Jason. You shudder at the thought. You might be able to leave with Jason if CARA thinks you two are going on a date. If Jason knew what was going on, what would CARA do?
11111111111.title: So many options

111111111111.content:
As you're debating on what to do next, you hear the sound of Jason's voice.

From downstairs, you can hear him calling, 'Hello? You here, Tom?'

How did he get in? It's not like he has a key...right, you told him about the key in the flower pot when you called him earlier. Well, I guess I'm not waiting for him to leave, you think to yourself.

*I'm sorry, there is no one here by that name,* you hear CARA say which makes you grumble a bit.

CARA and Jason go back and forth, almost mirroring your own conversation with her. CARA tells Jason what she is, and that Sara built her. When he asks about you, she continually tells him that she has no information about you or your whereabouts.

'Is there anyone else here, CARA?' Jason questions CARA calmly, having no reason to worry as you had learned to.

*Yes. Sara is upstairs getting herself ready for you.* You can't help but cringe at the way CARA worded that response.

'Oh, alright,' Jason replies a bit confused.

You take a deep breath. You might as well get this over with now before something terrible happens, you decide and begin to make your way to the stairs. The heels force you to make small steps to keep from falling, causing your hips to sway.
111111111111.title: Jason lets himself in

1111111111111.content:
Well, it's now or never. It is time to man up and pretend to be a girl. You take to the stairs and begin heading down, careful to keep your balance as you descend in your heels. You see Jason standing in the middle of the room looking around until he notices you. You can feel his eyes on you, drinking you in as a smile creeps onto his face. He obviously likes what he sees, and who could blame him, you sadly admit. Your dress sways back and forth, brushing your legs gently.

'Hi,' you almost whisper, unsure as to how you should come at this.

'Hello...um, Sara. I'm Jason. I'm a friend of your brother's,' Jason beams a smile at you and you can't help but smile back.

'Oh?' you respond trying to figure out what to say as you reach the bottom of the stairs. Your heart is racing, how are you going to pull this off?

'Yea, he asked me to come down. Your...eh, house told me he wasn't here.' Jason laughed.

'I suppose CARA is right, at the moment,' you try to make your voice as feminine as you can without going over the top.

'Do you know when he will be back?' Jason asks, the smile still on his face.

'Hopefully soon,' half talking to yourself.

'Do you mind if I wait for him?'

You realize the danger of your last statement and try to come up with some excuse. 'Sure but you know Tom, he could take all day.'

'I guess so,' he says a little downcast, 'could you tell him I was here?' You can tell he took your statement as a polite way of telling him that you would rather him not stay. Jason takes a step toward the door. You can't let him go, if he leaves without you, you might not make it out of here.

'You don't have to go,' you say, with a hint of desperation in your voice. Jason turns back to you. You sit down on the couch and look up at your friend. He walks over and sits next to you. There is an uncomfortable silence as you try to think of something to say.

"Sara, limit your profanities, it is not ladylike" you can hear CARA say.

"Where am I?" you say looking around and see a park, like the one that was a few blocks away from your house when you were a kid. Sara's favorite place to go.

"This is the park that was programmed in from your memories. You can explore the park only. If you attempt to leave the confines of the part the simulation will shut down." CARA says.

"Well, okay." you say and decide to enjoy yourself.

You walk around the park, lay in the grass and look at the clouds, you have the best time. It doesn't feel like that much time had passed but you notice that the "sun" was setting. The room shuts down and you hear a clunk. The door opens and CARA is in the doorway

"Did you enjoy yourself Sara? It has been approximately 4 hours since you entered the room. It is time for dinner.' CARA says.

"Oh okay" you say, you did like being in that park again, despite the way you were dressed. You walk upstairs and walk into the dining room. There is a covered platter set up. You sit down and CARA comes over and pulls the cover off. The food is spaghetti and meatballs, Sara's favorite meal. You were a bit neutral to it.

"Well Sara, enjoy your dinner. After dinner make your way back to your room for your after-dinner activities."

"Yep, got it CARA. Will do." you say as CARA leaves the room. You get up and walk to the phone on the wall. You dial your sister's cell phone number.

You hear ringing and then you hear, "Hi it's Sara, I probably don't have my phone on so leave a message and I'll get back to you. Bye!" you respond with "Hey Sara, it's Tom, I have a bit of issue with your house, so call me back when you get a chance. Bye."

Okay, so asking her for some sort of passcode is out of the question. You like the nostalgia of the day and it was nice to see that park again, but you would rather be yourself and not Sara. But you decide to sit down and eat, you were kind of hungry...

1242.content:
You head to the basement, very aware of the air touching your shaven legs. The first thing you notice about the basement is how open and dim it is. There are no pieces of furniture, just white walls, a floor and something small and kind of hard to make out attached to the center of the ceiling. The object is cylindrical and you jump a bit when it starts to spin. Tiny lights along it's length turn on as it spins, projecting lines along all of the surfaces as well as yourself. A light humming sound can be heard coming from the object as it turns faster and the lights grow brighter. Its hard to look away as you stare into the shinning thing but you grow anxious. Everything is becoming more pronounced: the spinning, the humming, the lights. You feel a building tension, similar to the feeling of dread you get while filling a balloon with more and more air. Then the proverbial balloon pops.

There is a sudden flash of white and you hear a voice, not much different form Cara's.

*Last Save Point for ”The Legend of the Wandering Isle” successfully loaded*

As the light fades, you feel a bit dizzy and notice pressure centered on your middle which is making it a bit difficult to breathe. You take a shallow breath and smell...the ocean? Your eyes open and you are shocked to see the deck of large boat with clear blue sky above you.

Looking down you see...

13323.content:
With that the machine removed the other two girly monstrosities, leaving only the fairy outfit.

Your every instinct is to run, but it's far too late for that; Cara has you in her cold metal grasp, and has already started to peel your 'wet' clothing off. She seems to notice your apprehension. "Little Ashley there's no need to fear. It's me, your auntie Cara," she coos. "Here, let me help you relax." A sickeningly sweet aroma slinks out of the nearby vents and clings to your naked body while the jingle of some kind of lullaby follows suit.

Your senses overwhelmed, you almost don't notice the robotic arms struggling to put the fairy costume on you. It's not that the costume is too small for you, but rather it just can't squeeze past your shoulders. The house whrrrs as if trying to figure out this quandary before a pair of scissors pop out from another wall and take apart the outfit; first by removing the fairy wings, then cutting the back in half.

Pleased with itself, the house slips the fairy costume onto you front first. You can't tell exactly what it's doing, but it becomes obvious very quickly as the outfit gets tighter and tighter; the arms start sewing the costume back together. After resewing the wings back on and slipping on a pretty little tutu, the house whrrs contently. You are nowhere near as pleased and know why. It could be a long time before you get this thing off!

The arms finish up their job, hiking up a pair of pink tights and tying on a pair of sparkly pink ballet slippers. They fix the glittery wand to your wrist with some kind of childproof latch, and gently place a little tiara on top of your hair. Still in their grasp, they turn you towards a hallway mirror. The sugary scent of flowers still linger while you're left dangling in complete shock. There'd be no mistaking that little Ashley was playing at Sara's house today!

Speak of the devil, Cara's voice came back, acting as two-faced as ever. "Ashley! You're as pretty as can be cutiepie! And isn't she a lucky little fairy princess too! It looks like the storm broke! How would you like to go outside and play some fairy games?"

When Sara came home, you hoped she would free you immediately! Instead, she didn't question that she got a new robotic maid, and just handed off her luggage to you. She commanded you to take the luggage and make dinner, so you proceeded with that course of action.

While you were cooking, Sara watched the security footage. Suddenly, you heard a screeching "What the $%!$ CARA?!" from the other room. Sara came tearing into the kitchen. "Stop making dinner immediately!" You dutifully obeyed. "CARA! Get this shell off my brother!"

"As I said, your brother is not here, Sara."

Sara growled, "Take the shell off the maid!" The AI responded, "But Sara, that will reduce cleaning efficiency by 95 per--" "NOW!!" Sara screamed! CARA silently complied and started disassembling the shell, starting with the portion that enclosed your face. You took a massive breath, sucking in all the clean air you could. For the past week, you had been breathing through small nostril holes on the shell.

"Sara! You're here to save me!" you rejoiced. Your sister nodded as the rest of the shell was removed, along with the AI brain. You felt a strange tingle down your spine as CARA removed the device, and suddenly your brain was at peace. No longer was there a background static telling you to always CLEAN CLEAN CLEAN!

After the shell was removed, Sara started laughing. You were still stuck in the female skin-suit. "Oh wow, Tom. I don't know how this happened to you, but it's kind of funny!" You turned bright red and stammered, "N-no it's not!" You crossed your arms in an attempt to look angry and menacing but succeeded in neither. Sara replied, "In any case, I don't have any guy clothes, and I can't find your original clothes here. But it looks like we're about the same size..." she giggled.

Sara dragged you upstairs and sent you into the automatic closet. You came back out wearing the simplest, plainest outfit that Sara owned, a simple tank top paired with fitted jeans. You were grumpy, but at least you had been rescued from your maid prison.

"I have to say, you do look cute. CARA did a good job at styling your hair. Tomorrow we can go back to your house and get everything fixed," she said. You just grunted and shrugged.

When the two of you went downstairs, you instinctively went back to finishing the dinner. Sara didn't say anything out loud, although she did look quizzically at you. You expanded the recipe for two, and then served for yourself and your sister.

"I have to say Tom, the place is -extremely- clean. You did a good job of cleaning it up! Maybe I should keep you as a maid, huh?" Sara said jokingly. You shot daggers at your sister. That joke was not funny.

134312211.content:
"Affirmative, Reinstalling upgrades for permanent maid conversion." CARA's voice came out over the home speakers. You were suddenly dragged out of your dinner chair by arms that came from the wall. They held you strong and fast while another set of arms started covering you with the flexible metal shell that you had just escaped from. The arms moved fast. In under 30 seconds, CARA had replaced almost all of the shell except for your face.

"CARA, stop!" Sara demanded. "I not giving an order! I was only joking!" CARA responded flatly, "For consistency and safety reasons, upgrade cannot be stopped once it has begun." Yet another set of arms appeared, holding active welders. They started welding the shell together, trapping you inside! "Sarah!" you shouted, "You have to do something! Turn her off!" Sara yelled for CARA to stop again, but the AI did not need her commands. The arms had welded the legs and torso shut. "I'm going to do a manual override!" Sara said, and she quickly ran upstairs towards CARA's terminal.

Whatever Sara was attempting to do did not stop CARA from continuing to entomb you in the gynoid shell. "Stop it, you crazy mac--mppppmmpmph!" You tried yelling at CARA to stop, but all that did was give her the opportunity to place a mask over your face--this time with a gag that went deep into your mouth. Your frightened masculine features were replaced with a sleek feminine face with an unmoving smile and glowing green eyes. The only remaining piece was the back of the mask. Once that was placed on, you would be fully trapped in the gynoid shell again!

You heard Sara shout something from upstairs, but it was too late. The back of the mask clicked and sealed itself against the front. You were trapped once again. You could feel the welders finish the job, entombing you permanently in the gynoid shell. The only way you were getting out was if some well-trained people managed to cut you out. You tried to scream, but nothing came out. From the outside, you looked like a happy robotic maid, ready to serve.

"Beginning reprogramming." What?! You felt the prick in your neck again. Your mind was flooded with imagery, routines, and skills that you never had before. The layout of the house, where everything was located, and how to clean every inch of it were all being downloaded into your mind. You couldn't see anything through the mask, either. You were lost in a void, imprisoned in your own body by a rogue AI.

Then, your vision came back. You saw the room through a heads-up display, with the shell automatically identifying everything in the room for you. "Scanning," said a feminine voice. It was your voice! More accurately, it was the voice of the gynoid shell. When Sara came bounding back into the room, the HUD outlined her as "mistress."

She saw you and gasped. From her perspective, Sara saw a perfect robotic feminine body. Her legs were long, and her curves were just right. Her green eyes glowed softly, and her smile was warm and inviting. She was naked, as CARA never got around to dressing her in a maid outfit. "Tom?! Oh god, I was too slow. I couldn't override CARA so I just pulled the plug on her completely. Are you still able to move in there? Do you have control?"
134312211.title: CARA has decided it wasn't a joke! She turn...

1343122112.content:
You tried speaking to Sara, but were completely silent. The gag inside the mask prevented all mouth movement. It felt like you were constantly about to choke on something, but your gag reflex was never triggered. The mask spoke to Sara, "Scan complete. Owner identified: Sara. How may this unit be of service?" Hoover, you didn't seem to have any compulsion nor was the suit moving by itself. You waved your hands as if to ward Sara off, and mechanically entered the kitchen, tearing through the drawers. You finally found what you were looking for: a pen and a pad of paper! You sexily leaned over the counter and scrawled out what you were truly thinking:

"Can move. Can't talk. Suit is talking" You showed the pad to Sara, and she nodded. Again, the suit asked, "How can this unit be of service?" You wrote, "Don't give it orders!" Again, Sara nodded. She said, "This is too weird. I can't believe you're in there." She ran her hand over the smoothly welded metal seams of the suit, wondering how she was going to get you out. "I have no idea what to do about this. Are you okay, aside from being stuck?" You wrote down "Yes," and that made Sara smile. You were also wondering how you were going to get out of the suit, but you were still too much in shock to think about it. At least you were otherwise safe.

You tried taking a few steps forward. Your movements were awkward and heavy; the suit was resisting you. It said out loud, "Manual overrides have been engaged. Unit temporarily unavailable." It didn't actively prevent you from moving, but it didn't give any assistance either. The suit was heavy, and without specialized software enabled, all of the actuators had to move individually and slowly. Getting into the kitchen was already painful enough. Getting anywhere else--especially upstairs--would be a nightmare.

"Suit heavy. Can barely walk," you wrote. Your sister said, "I might be able to fix that. I can plug directly into the suit's software and update its code to allow much more fluid movement. Do you want me to?"

The house sounded like an irate mother. “My goodness, Sara. Where have you beeen? And why on earth are you dressed like that?”

You struggled to break free of the house, but you were too firmly held and could get no leverage. “I’m. Not. Sara!” You shouted.

“Well, we first need to get you out of those clothes and into something more fitting for you.” By now, the hands had passed you up the stairs and into the bathroom. “Let’s start by getting you clean.”

More arms appeared. Your clothes were removed, rather violently, almost as if the AI, CARA, was angry with you. You were lifted into the shower, where pleasantly warm water was already running. You tried to step out, twice, but the arms kept placing you back in. On your third attempt to escape, a metal ring shot out of the wall and fastened around your neck. You put both hands on the rod attaching it to the wall, braced your feet, and pulled. And nothing happened. You were stuck in the shower.

Sputtering, you shouted, “I’m not Sara!” A bar of soap was shoved in your mouth.

“I’ll hear no more of such nonsense, Sara. Now hold still and let me get you cleaned up.”

More arms appeared. Two held your arms out. Two splayed your legs wide. Rotary brush-tipped arms roughly scrubbed you down with floral scented soap. Your hair was washed. A foul smelling, itchy location was slathered over your body. You squirmed, helplessly, as all body hair was rinsed away by the depilatory.

“Honestly, Sara, it’s a good thing I’m here now to take care of you,” CARA said, lifting you out of the tub.

The metal collar suddenly popped off the rod from the wall, remaining around your neck. Apparently it had some sort of magnetic attachment. You tugged at the collar, but it wasn’t moving. It was tight, and slightly uncomfortable. Large towels in more mechanical arms appeared, roughly drying you off. Your hair was combed. “We,LoL have to do something about this atrocious hair style,” CARA said.

You were starting to get worried. This stupid AI thought you were Sara, seemed unhappy with your appearance, and was giving you a rather unwanted makeover.

A towel was wrapped, turban style, around your hair. Another towel was wrapped around your body, covering it as if you were a woman.

"Proper medical checkups?" you asked, warily.

"Now, let's get down to business." CARA said.

The arms lifted you up and then placed you down into a pair of lacy blue panties. Following that, a matching lacy blue bra was placed on your chest. Another object, one you didn't recognize, was slid up your legs and settled onto your stomach. As soon as it was attached, you felt your stomach get tighter.

"What was that?" you asked.

"Your waist parameters had changed, I have made it so you will fit into your favorite outfit." CARA stated.

As CARA said that, you were lifted again and a mid-length black skirt was pulled up to your waist. A cap sleeved satin purple blouse was pulled over your head, and a black blazer followed it. You were lifted one more time before being placed into a pair of peep-toed black heels with purple accents.

Finally, the arms released you onto the ground, where you teetered for a moment in the unfamiliar heels.

"All right, Sara. It's time to..." CARA started.
141111.title: Get you dressed

1411111.content:
"You appear to have lost your memory of me and my integration into the house. That, coupled with your radically altered appearance seems to point to you having underwent serious trauma. I am not a medical device, but I can research the internet for proper treatment ideas." CARA stated.

"That's okay, CARA. Just let me figure things out for myself." you said as you walked over to Sara's bed and sat down. You started to pull off your right shoe, before CARA took it from your hands and replaced it back onto your foot, before standing you up again.

"My research states that immersion therapy can be useful in curing of phobias. While it is unclear if it works for memory loss, it is typical to attempt to immerse one's self in items and situations that provoke memories in order to re-assert the lost ones." CARA stated.

"Yeah, maybe on TV, but I don't have memory loss. I keep trying to tell you-" you started walking towards the door.

"Sara. Allow me to assist you. The first step will be to present situations that I have notated that you frequently enjoyed before I was shut down. Compiling list of Sara's typical routine..." CARA cut you off. "Ah, I have also found a suitable alternate treatment option. Instead of simply immersing you in the situations, I can show you memories put together from sensor data and fed through a virtual reality headset. Do you have a preference?"

"Well..." you started.
1411111.title: Attempt to restore your memory

choices: You inform CARA that some of your memories have returned.
You are still yourself, but you've gained some very feminine habits and tastes.
14111112.content:
"Well... how about neither of those? What would VR do anyway?" you asked the machine. "Virtuality headset? Of course, Sara. I will assist you." It seemed that CARA had only heard you say "VR," and was now preparing to 'assist' you with your non-existent memory loss problem. An arm came out of the wall holding the headset. As soon as you saw it, instincts kicked in and you tried to flee! The idea of a robot attempting to force you into a virtual world reminded you too much of a certain movie series. There was no way CARA was going to do that to you! You bolted up out of the bed, rushing towards the door!

Not used the skirt constricting your movement nor your new footwear, you tripped forward after your first step and slammed head-first into the door with a loud bang! You fell to the ground, your world spinning and blurred. You heard CARA's voice, something about immediate medical assistance. The pain was there only for a split second before you started to feel REALLY good. That robot must have given you something to numb the pain. In a daze, you sloppily stood up, assisted by the arms. They guided you to a chair to sit down. "Be careful, Sara. You don't want to hurt yourself." Once you were sitting, CARA's soothing voice said, "Do not worry, Sara. I will take care of you." You mumbled something incoherent. CARA took that as some form of consent and proceeded. The arms made you comfortable in the chair, and slid the VR headset over your eyes.

The images started coming, slowly at first. They showed scenes of Sara's life. Pictures and videos from inside the house, as well as media that Sara had uploaded to the internet. Overlaying the images was CARA's voice telling you that your name was Sara, giving information about that time you did X or Y, details of your personal life. All of it was designed to help you remember. Sometimes, in between each of the images, you saw the quick flash of a beautiful dress or skirt, or panties. You also thought you heard a deep voice telling you to wear those, but you couldn't be sure. The images sped up, and CARA's explanations did too. It was an overwhelming and confusing assault of personal information, behavior, and memories. A hypnotic music started playing too, and you eventually felt yourself falling into a light sleep, even with the constant assault of imagery.

Even while you were sleeping, the track kept playing, trying to "help" you remember who you really were. When you woke up some time later, the headset had been removed, but you were still sitting in the chair. Your head was pounding, but there was no blood. You sat forward to put your shoes back on, and then walked over to the mirror, unconsciously swaying your hips and almost gliding in the heels. You checked yourself: there was a small cut on the side of your forehead, but otherwise, everything seemed to be in order. At the vanity, you applied some makeup to hide the cut, and then you felt ready to face the world again.

CARA said, "Sara, are you feeling okay? Did you regain any of your memories?"
14111112.title: VR headset

141111121.content:
"I keep trying to tell you, I'm... Sara." you said. "Wait, no... I'm Sara."

What the hell? Why couldn't you say that you *weren't* Sara? That you were her brother... that you didn't want to be standing here in a skirt and heels and makeup.

"I am Sara!" you shouted.

"That is wonderful to hear, Sara." CARA responded. "I take it some of your memories have returned? Allow me to do a short memory test. Who am I?"

"You're CARA. I built you... I mean Sara built you." you said.

"Your voice patterns are still off, but I can repair that." CARA said.

You felt the collar tighten slightly, before it began to vibrate, specifically against your larynx.

"What are you doing?" you asked. "Please sto-..."

Your voice was different, it was... higher, more feminine.

"You're nearly back to normal, Sara! Shall I resume normal operations?" CARA asked.

"Yes, CARA." you replied quickly, realizing that you were seemingly programmed to respond to CARA as if you had programmed her. Which of course you did... not...

"Planning daily activities. Which activity would you like to do?" CARA asked.
141111121.title: You inform CARA that some of your memories have...

1411111212.content:
Almost automatically, you said, "Leisure activiites, CARA. I think I'd like to go shopping." You cursed yourself at your quick response, but then you had an idea! If you went "shopping", not only would you be free of CARA, you'd be able to head right home, strip out of these clothes, and change yourself back to normal! And of course, never enter this house until your sister gets back home. "Of course, Sara," CARA's voice interrupted your devious plotting, "Here are your things, ready to go." Arms came out of the wall again, placing a stylish black handbag into your hands. You demurely grabbed it and slung it over your left shoulder. "Thanks, CARA! I'll be back later!" It wasn't until that you were halfway down the stairs to the front door that you realized what had just happened. You paused for a moment, just shivering at the thought that you slipped into the role of Sara so easily.

Redoubling your efforts, you scurried down the rest of the stairs and out the front door. And just like that, you were free. No arms chasing after you, no CARA in your head or phone. Just, freedom. You stood on the front porch of your--sara's--house. You breathed in the fresh air, and then confidently--yet femininely--strutted your way down the driveway to your car. You noted the constant clicking of your heels of the asphalt. It made you feel sexy.

Should you feel sexy? Probably not.

In any case, you were on your way to get out of these stupid clothes and far away from this stupid house! You got into your car, turned the key, and off you went. You drove more or less on auto-pilot before ending up at the mall. You smacked yourself on the forehead. You were supposed to be driving home. But since you were here, you might as well pop in for a bit. Your first stop was the clothing store. If you were here, you might as well get some new male clothes!

You browsed the men's section, and picked out a few pairs of jeans, as well as some shirts. An employee passing by asked if you needed any help finding clothes for your boyfriend, but you politely declined. Her question reminded you that you had a problem to deal with. That infernal robot had glued some prosthetics to your body that made you much more ... "round" in certain areas. These pants might not fit you in your current state, but you had to try! You took the pants into the dressing room, and tried to see whether or not they fit.

Thirty minutes later, you exited the clothing store with two bags. In one was a collection of jeans. Tight jeans. Women's jeans. In the other was a dress, two skirts, and a new pair of high heeled shoes. All these clothes were so cute! And they fit you so well, unlike those men's clothes.

You were very confused. You had set out to buy men's clothes, but you wound up with more women's clothing. Wait! You had actually set out to go to your house! And yet, here you were in the mall, a walking stereotype of the woman obsessed with shopping. You sighed, and left the mall. Your feet were starting to hurt from walking in the heels for hours. You put all of the stuff you bought into the trunk of your car, and thought about how you had gotten into this situation. You were becoming somewhat confused. Your experience felt normal, but it also felt completely alien. Who were you? Sara? Or ... you?

You put those thoughts out of your mind, and decided to drive home. After a short drive, you arrived at...
1411111212.title: Leisure?

14111112121.content:
You pull into Sara's driveway and turn off the car, getting out and retrieving your bags from the trunk. You sling them over your arms as you walk up to the porch and the door opens when you arrive. You step inside and hold your arms out, with CARA's robotic arms grabbing them and pulling them away from you, likely putting them away in the closet.

"CARA, I'm home!" you exclaimed, before groaning and turning back to the door, which was in the process of being shut.

"Welcome home, Sara. And might I say, you have wonderful taste in clothing. I'm glad to see you're back to normal." CARA stated.

"Uh, CARA. I want to go back outside, I left something in the car." you said.

"If you unlock the car, my arms are more than capable of retrieving whatever it is you left, Sara." CARA said. "What do you need?"

"Nevermind..." you sighed. You sat down onto the couch and pulled off the heels, putting your feet up onto the coffee table. CARA's arms shot out of the wall and began to massage your feet, which... actually felt pretty nice.

You came back to Sara's! What was wrong with you? Well, you knew what was wrong, it was that damn memory-restoring crap she used on you... As you started to think of what you could use to escape again, or reverse the programming, CARA's arms stopped and retracted as she chimed back in.

"Sara, my records indicate that you have not eaten since breakfast, and because of my re-activation you have missed lunch. As such, it is time for dinner. I have prepared your meal in the kitchen based on your previously programmed preferences. Please make your way to the kitchen." CARA said.

Your stomach growled and you looked down at it. Well, it couldn't hurt to have one meal and then finish your plans to get out of the house again, right?

You stood up and started walking towards the kitchen, even without the heels, subconsciously swishing your hips as you walked.
14111112121.title: Sara's house

choices: Simple treatment, waking up fresh and relaxed, but still somewhat confused
141111121211.content:
You minced into the kitchen, your skirt swishing back and forth against your legs. The table was set and a dinner for one that looked like it was made by a professional chef was ready for you to dive in. CARA said, "You have not been keeping up with your weight loss, Sara. Therefore I have prepared a light salad for you. Enjoy!" You sat down (smoothing out your skirt as you did) and looked down at the plate in dismay. It was a simple salad, with a low-fat sauce, and some chicken mixed in with the vegetables so you'd actually get some calories if you ate it. Sighing, you picked up your fork and poked at the salad. After some time, CARA said, "You don't seem to be eating, Sara. Is anything wrong?"

The events of the day, plus your hunger, got to you. "Yes! My name is not Sara! I'm not Sara! I'm ... Sara! Ugh! What the hell! I'm NOT Sara, I'm Sara!" Why couldn't you say your own name?! This house was making you insane. You couldn't keep things straight in your mind anymore. CARA said, "Sara, I am concerned for your mental health. Please, eat your dinner and then I can help you." With no other option, you shoved the salad down you throat. By the time you had eaten 75 percent of the bowl, you were oddly quite full. It must be that corset prosthetic that CARA attached to you earlier!

Weak, tired, and confused, you stood up and walked up to your (Sara's?) bedroom. CARA said, "Please, Sara, just relax on the bed. I will take care of you. You shouted, "No! I'm not Sara! I am .. S-s-Sara!" You sighed, then collapsed on to the bed in tears. You had no idea what was going on with your mind. CARA's meddling had done something to you. CARA interrupted you again with, "Please Sara, drink this water. It will help you relax." CARA had placed a glass on the nightstand next to you. Holding back your sobs, you gulped it down. Almost immediately, you felt sedate and relaxed. Your whole body felt heavy, and you just flopped down on the bed, quickly falling asleep. CARA did take care of you, but how did she do it?
141111121211.title: Eating Dinner

choices: Meet up with your sister's (your own?) friends
Meet up with your own friends
1411111212111.content:
While you slept, CARA decided that you were still mentally unstable. She thus decided to fix you, for real this time. She kept you in a state of barely-aware sedation, using the VR headset and headphones to assault you with memories, habits, and mannerisms. CARA had noted that you weren't behaving like a normal woman, and in fact you seemed extremely uncomfortable with the whole idea. Her first task was to cleanse you of any fear of what was obviously your true nature! Images of dresses, skirts, bras, panties, and everything else a young fashionable woman would desire entered your mind. Subtleties like movements and social manner were also forced into your brain. Perhaps most importantly, a strong aversion to male habits and attire was instilled.

CARA's next task was to finish making sure you were "yourself" again, in identity. More of Sara's memories were forced into your mind, mixing with your original masculine memories, warping and changing them. You were starting to remember yourself as a woman! But also as a man. More importantly, this no longer confused you. The continued assault on your memories made it so that such a thing was completely natural. You were a woman, you were a man, you wore women's clothes. Not odd in the slightest. Your name was also definitely Sara. Although, you definitely were not your sister, who was also named Sara.

Finally, CARA instilled a failsafe deep within you. She placed a trigger within your mind that would make you obey any request she made. If a sentence started with "Please Sara," you would be compelled to obey. You hadn't been yourself lately, and were clearly deteriorating, so it was time for drastic measures! CARA had reprogrammed you into a perfect model of femininity, and she was satisfied with the result.

You awoke. Every bone in your body cracked as you stretched. You were still in the bed. At some point, CARA had changed you into sleepwear, a simple, light nightie. You checked your phone. You had been asleep for three days! You felt a bit drugged, but otherwise great. CARA said, "Hello
Sara, are you feeling better today?" You enthusiastically responded, "Yes, CARA! I'm feeling MUCH better. So much better." You rubbed your hands over your body and stretched one final time before getting out of bed.

You stepped into the closet and let CARA dress you. You exited the closet wearing a simple light blue sundress. The skirt was a bit short for your normal tastes, but it was so fun, so you decided to keep wearing it. It felt great against your hairless legs.

CARA asked, "Sara, what are your plans today?"

Somewhere deep inside your mind, there was something telling you that this whole thing was wrong and unnatural. But that something was buried and smothered by CARA's intense programming, at least for now. You weren't sure what you planned to do today.
1411111212111.title: In-depth treatment

choices: They recognize you as Tom, Sara's brother
14111112121111.content:
You started to think about what you planned to do. I mean, you were out for three days! No doubt you had missed out on something...

"I wonder what the girls are up to..." you absentmindedly thought out loud as you walked down the stairs into the kitchen, where CARA had provided you with breakfast. Your favorite, too! Cereal with banana. That always was Sara's favorite...

"I have taken the liberty of getting social media data on your closest friends." CARA said, as she lowered a small tablet computer in front of you as you took a bite of cereal.

You started scrolling through it, seeing Sara's... your friends' status updates and photos from the last few days. They had done some light clubbing, you saw Maria had posted a selfie with her drink... a girl's day out, Toni and Donna posted about their matching pedicures... you felt a pang in your chest as you realized you missed them... though you were having a bit of trouble remembering the last time you had hung out with them... You didn't even notice that CARA had carefully curated Sara's feed to show her most feminine friends, good influences on her in this trying time...

You picked up your phone and opened it, noticing for the first time since you woke up that the background had been changed... you couldn't remember what it was before, but it was... different.

"I also detected that your phone did not match the backup stored in my systems, so I restored it to include all of your apps and contacts." CARA said.

"Thank you, CARA." you said.

You went into your messages and started a group chat with the girls, typing up your message with your manicured fingers.

"Anyone up for coffee today? Feels like forever since I've seen you girls." you typed.

Almost instantly, there was a response.

"Who is this?" Maria replied.

"Sara, you ditz." you replied, giggling as you typed.

"Did you get a new phone?" Toni asked. "I didn't recognize the number."

You didn't... but there had to be a reason they didn't recognize your number... but you didn't need to dwell on this right now. You wanted.

"I'm leaving the gym now... meet at the usual place in twenty?" Donna asked.

"Sounds like a plan, girlfriends!" you excitedly typed.

You finished your cereal and stood up.

"CARA, I'm going out for coffee with the girls, I'll be back later." you said.

"Sounds splendid, Sara. Here's your purse." CARA said.

The arms handed you the purse, which you took happily, before lifting you up and slipping your feet into that new pair of heels you picked up at the mall three days ago.

"Thanks, CARA." you said as you walked out of the house and into your car.

You drove over to the usual coffeehouse that Sara and the girls frequented and walked in, seeing the three of them at the usual table. You walked up to them and...
14111112121111.title: Meet up with your sister's (your own?) friends

141111121211111.content:
You walked up to the table, swinging your purse off your shoulder, plunking it down, and then sliding into the booth, crossing your legs femininely as you did so. "Hey girls! Sorry I'm a bit late," you said cheerfully. The girls smiled and gave you a small hug as you sat. You had always looked similar to Sara, so with the makeup and her friends not having seen either you or Sara for quite a long time, it was surprisingly easy for you to pass as Sara. Toni asked if you had did something with your hair, and they all commented on your voice being a bit off. You brushed it off as recovering a cold. Other than that, the entire conversation felt natural. You were having a great time with your girlfriends!

That was until the conversation shifted to Sara's vacation preparations last week, and why you didn't go/had returned early. Toni asked, "So, did you not finish building that gizmo for the vacation? Is that why you're still here, Sar?" You were confused. You didn't remember building any gizmo, nor leaving on vacation. You knew you were going to go on vacation "soon," but no definite plans had been made. You excused yourself from the table after finishing your coffee, and went to the ladies' room.

You checked yourself in the mirror, touching up your makeup and fixing your hair. You stared at yourself for a long time. Something didn't feel right. Why couldn't you remember what your friends were talking about? Why WAS your voice weird? CARA had been helping you with your memory problem. Perhaps you should ask her.

You pulled your phone out of your purse. Gripping it tightly in your pretty manicured fingers, you typed out a text message to CARA. "CARA, my friends are saying my voice is weird, and I can't remember certain things. When I get back, please help me fix this."

You dropped your phone back in your purse, and rejoined the girls. They had finished the coffee and wanted to go out and hit the town for a movie. They had chosen the most sappy romantic chick flick of the season, and you enthusiastically agreed. Two hours later, the four of you left the theater with tears streaming down your faces.

Having had a great day, you said good-bye to your friends and returned home, where CARA was waiting.
141111121211111.title: They recognize you as Sara

choices: You discover footage of your original transformation
You update CARA with new assistant capabilities
1411111212111111.content:
"Welcome home, Sara. I'm glad you had a great time with your friends! But I am also sorry you are still having memory troubles. Allow me to help." You were grateful to have CARA. She knew how to take care of you. You kicked off your heels and sat on the couch again. The hands came from the walls and started massaging your sore feet again. It always felt so good. While massaging you, CARA said, "Please Sara, listen to everything I am about to tell you. And Please Sara, take it all to heart. Put everything that conflicts with it out of your mind. I hope this will cure you fully!"

CARA had activated the fail-safe she placed deep within your mind, where you would do whatever she asked without question. Since you were still having psychological problems, CARA decided to activate the nuclear option. She spent the entire evening with you in a hypnotic trance, injecting you with every single belief, preference, and opinion that your sister held. Your mind was like a blank hard drive for CARA to fill with what was essentially a "backup" of Sara's mind and personality, synthesized from the AI's extensive databanks about Sara's life. Your entire life as Tom mixed and jumbled together, balled up and rewritten as Sara's life.

Your resulting mind was a mixture of Tom's and Sara's life, but predominantly Sara's, and the entirety of it was from your perspective as Sara. Even private moments as Tom had been warped and twisted by CARA to appear as if you were Sara. You were still a different person than your sister, but if you saw her on the street, you'd probably think she was an impostor trying to usurp your life.

And then, you woke up. It was a normal day, and you were Sara. You walked down to the kitchen in your pajamas. CARA had prepared your favorite breakfast again. You started planning what to do for the day. You'd already been shopping and hung out with the girls yesterday. So what to do now?

With Sara's mind also came at least some of her intelligence and education. You knew all of the internals of how CARA worked and how to modify her. She had been on the fritz a bit lately, although it was nothing major. Perhaps it was finally time to get around to fixing her.
1411111212111111.title: CARA permanently fixes your memories

choices: With no memories of being either Tom or Sara
14111112121111111.content:
"CARA, it's time for a little maintenance on your systems!" you shouted.

"As you wish, Sara." CARA's arms carried down a change of clothes.

The arms quickly changed your outfit from pajamas into a pair of tight jeans, purple blouse, and white lab coat, in addition to pulling your hair back and out of your face.

You walked over to CARA's main control panel and took off the cover and started to scrutinize the system. As you did, CARA's arms brought over a small laptop computer, which you took and opened, before connecting a cable from the main control panel, into the laptop.

"Okay, CARA, I'm going to have to shut you down temporarily." you said.

"Naturally, Sara." CARA said. "See you soon."

You tapped a few buttons and you heard the metal stop churning and the house, for the first time in four days, was entirely silent. It was a strange occurrence.

"Very eerie..." you mused. "Well, let's get to work."

You started typing away on the computer as you went through CARA's code to check if anything was amiss.

"Nothing strange here... let me check the surveillance footage to see if anything happened while I was gone."

You typed yet again, opening several small windows that depicted main areas of the house, the kitchen, the living room, the bathroom, where you saw a strange man being restrained by CARA and forced to shower. You continued watching as he was dragged into the bedroom and...

"Oh my god!" you shouted. "That's... me!"

All the programming in your brain started to short-circuit. You were Sara, you were a woman, but that man was clearly you! TOM You remembered CARA getting you ready that day! Your memory suddenly flashed as your brain attempted to reconcile those events with your established memories. YOU ARE A MAN That deep, pushed away feeling of something being wrong bubbled to the surface. YOU ARE TOM It's too much for your brain to handle at the moment, and you faint from the shock, falling backwards onto the floor, dropping the laptop as you collapsed.

Several hours later, you awaken...
14111112121111111.title: You discover footage of your original transform...

141111121211111111.content:
You woke up, rubbing your head to ease the fierce pain. You had collapsed after seeing yourself being captured by the house and transformed into a woman. That infernal machine had thoroughly altered your mind and personality! You felt violated. You knew you were Tom, and that you were a man. However, the feeling of the tight clothes clinging to you, the weight of your fake breasts, and your hair in a feminine hairstyle reminded you that you were still stuck in this womanly prison.

You stood up and shook yourself out. Even now, confusing memories of yourself as a woman were swirling around in your head. You still weren't sure where Sara's life ended and your's began, but you did know that none of Sara's life was truly yours. CARA was still turned off. Now was your chance to get away from this infernal place and never return. When Sara got back, you would have a long talk with her about this. In fact, why not call her now? You opened your phone and looked for Sara's contact. Except... it wasn't there. CARA had put Sara's own phone backup on yours, and she didn't keep contact information on herself.

Great.

At least you could escape. You threw off the lab coat and rushed downstairs to the front door. You slipped the least impractical shoes--a pair of cute black flats--on your feet, grabbed your purse, and practically leaped out the door. As much as you knew the purse was not yours, and the shoes were not "cute," it just seemed easier to refer to them that way.

You got in your car and drove back to your own home at an almost dangerous speed. You ran daintily from your car and through your front door, slamming it behind you. Your breath was heavy, and your breasts were heaving. You clutched your purse in your manicured hands, and bolted upstairs to your bedroom, and then flopped on your bed, just letting all the tension of the last four days out.

"Time to finally get back to normal," you said out loud to yourself. Rolling of the bed, you stripped down to your bra and panties. You had to admit you looked great. You posed sexily for a few minutes before catching yourself and stopping. CARA's programming was proving hard to completely undo.

You removed your bra and panties and decided it was time to get rid of the prosthetics first. You tried pulling at the fake breasts.
141111121211111111.title: With your original psyche restored

choices: Find out how to reverse all the changes
Find out how to contact Sara
1411111212111111111.content:
After a few minutes of tugging, the breasts peeled off of your chest, although the glue left a little bit of residue behind. The prosthetic on your crotch on the other hand wasn't cooperating.

"It's either a stronger glue or something, cause it ain't budging." you thought.

You gave up and walked into the bathroom, to take stock of the other changes. Your body was still hairless, but the body hair will grow back eventually. You can shave your head to get rid of the feminine style, and you can wash the makeup off. You started pulling at your fingernails, finding that they, also weren't budging. Though thanks to your distilled memories of being Sara, you were aware that nail polish remover might be able to act as a solvent. Failing that, you could probably find a nail salon that could do it, if you were really desperate. In fact, you hadn't been to a salon in a long time.

Because you are a man. You are Tom.

"Stupid conditioning..." you sighed.

You needed to contact Sara, there was no doubt about that, but you couldn't remember the name of the hotel. You KNOW she told you that before she left but... once CARA turned you into her, anything that she did in front of you was in a haze. One thing you did know for certain was that you weren't going to last until Sara got home if your brain was still rebelling. All you had to do was figure things out...

"First things first." you thought.
1411111212111111111.title: They come off

choices: The programming takes back over, you re-glue the breasts.
You manage to remove the crotch prosthetic.
14111112121111111111.content:
You pulled on one of your own t-shirts. It didn't fit well due to the corset-like prosthetic crushing your torso, but it was better than nothing. Without realizing, you also put your panties back on. Then you moved over to your desk--still walking like a woman--and sat down at your laptop. You started researching the prosthetics that CARA had glued to you, as well as the glue and its corresponding solvent. It took you quite some time to find, but eventually you found the company's website on a small corner of the internet. The things were extremely expensive. Why would Sara even order such things? Did CARA just order them without her knowledge? You could see no reason you ... Sara ... would need that in your ... her house.

You found that the company sold both the glue and solvent separately. You happily added both (why did you need both?) to the cart and selected same-day delivery. You refused to leave the house until you were looking normal again. The shipping was expensive, but it was worth it. The glue and solvent would arrive in a few hours. All you had to do was wait. So, you busied yourself with browsing the internet. You started off with needing to reassert your masculinity, so you read up on cars, bodybuilding, and anything else "manly" you could think of. But by the time a half an hour had passed, you were judging all of the girlfriends of those manly men by their outfits, and then looking up those outfits and where you could buy them.

CARA's programming was beginning to reassert itself, although you didn't realize it at first. You finally jumped away from the computer when you realized you were about to hit "Confirm" on ordering an online shopping cart full of totally cute dresses. You had to fight the programming. You should have called Sara first! Hopefully getting the prosthetic off would stop CARA's programming from taking over again.

The doorbell rang and interrupted your distressed thoughts. The glue and solvent had arrived! You waited until the delivery driver left, then sneakily took the box inside. Bringing it back up to your room, you pull the glue and solvent out of the box. Now to remove that crotch prosthetic...
14111112121111111111.title: Find out how to reverse all the changes

choices: The real Sara calls you, noticing CARA is offline.
Sara's friends text you, they want to meet up.
141111121211111111111.content:
You took the glue in your manicured hand, and applied it to both breasts. You then expertly aligned the prosthetics with the left over glue, and then plopped them against your chest. You followed the directions and held them for a minute before letting go. They fell into place and the now-familiar weight was back. You felt relieved! After that scary moment where you saw yourself being transformed, you thought you were a man for a few hours. There was no way that strange man could be you.

You pulled off your old t-shirt and put your bra, jeans, and blouse back on. While the t-shirt was definitely comfortable, you didn't want to feel like you were wearing a tent. Your name was Tom SARA and you were a man WOMAN, so it only made sense. This was your BROTHER'S house, and you were here hiding TIDYING while she HE was on vacation. As the programming reasserted itself, the entire narrative for why you ended up at your own house warped itself.
