The programming came back even stronger than it was before, and when the stronger glue had finally dried, you tested its adhesiveness. The breasts weren't coming off at all without that solvent. You looked at the solvent on your bed. Picking it up, you tossed it into the trash. When it hit the bottom of the bin, the final mental lock clicked, and you were Sara again. These were your boobs and crotch. This was your body, and you felt great!
141111121211111111111.title: The programming takes back over, you re-glue th...

choices: Something is wrong and she needs to head home
Everything is fine and she's going to stay
1411111212111111111111.content:
You settled down onto the couch in the living room to relax and turned on the TV, flipping through several channels, before you were unable to decide between watching a Lifetime movie, or a science documentary. As you cycled back and forth between them, your phone started to ring. You picked it up.

"Hello?" you asked.

"Tom is that you?" Sara, the real Sara, your sister asked on the other end. "What's up with your voice?"

"Sara! Great to hear from you!" you exclaimed, ignoring that she had called you Tom.

It was a childhood nickname, you think, cause you used to be a bit of a tomboy... yeah, that sounds right.

"Listen, is anything wrong? I just got a ping on my laptop that CARA was activated and is now offline... did you touch that metal circuit breaker that I explicitly told you not to touch?" she asked.

"Yeah, but everything is all right now. CARA was a big help." you said.

"You USED CARA?" Sara asked. "...Did anything out of the ordinary happen? Any security issues?"

"Not that I noticed. I took her offline before I left, so don't worry about a thing." you said as you inspected your nails.

"...All right." Sara said.

"Just enjoy the science convention. You've only got a few days before you're back anyway, right?" you asked.

"Yeah. I'll be back soon, and please don't activate CARA again." Sara replied.

"Of course." you said. "See you soon."

You hung up the phone.

In her hotel room, Sara placed her cell phone down onto the nightstand and scrunched her face in thought.

"He sounded fine but..." Sara started. "Maybe I should head back early..."

A few moments later, she had decided that...
1411111212111111111111.title: The real Sara calls you, noticing CARA is offline.

choices: CARA repurposes Sara into an assitant unit
14111112121111111111111.content:
The real Sara decided she should head back early. Her brother sounded too strange, and she did not trust CARA around other people. She began packing her things and preparing for departure...

Back home, you had just hung up the phone while house-sitting for your brother. It quickly dawned on you that you did not have a sister! You had a brother, but that was it. Scared, you quickly scurried home. You returned to CARA's main switch where you fell earlier. Turning the laptop back on, you saw it was still playing the surveillance footage from earlier when a strange man invaded your house. You looked at him and paused ... and nothing. He was a stranger, and you had no idea who he was. You fast-forwarded through the tapes and saw that CARA had dragged him into the closet. That gave you an idea! "CARA, it's time to set a trap!" You exclaimed deviously. You turned CARA back on, and she immediately responded. "Of course, Sara. I will be happy to secure the home." You and CARA began preparing. Unbeknownst to you, she also silently deleted that surveillance footage.

The real Sara finally got back home. It was late. The flight across the country was long and expensive. She just really hoped her brother was okay. The taxi dropped her off at her front door. The lights of the house were off. The situation already felt wrong. Sara slowly turned the key, and opened her front door. The house was quiet--not even the hum of CARA could be heard. "Hello?" she asked. "Anyone here?"

Moments after Sara announced her presence, the house came to life. The sudden activation scared Sara, and then it was too late. The arms of the house grabbed her. She shouted and struggled, telling CARA to let her go! The AI refused to acknowledge her, only saying, "You are intruder, and intruders will be dealt with." The last sound Sara made was a desperate "Nooo!" as the arms dragged her into the closet and shut the door.
14111112121111111111111.title: Something is wrong and she needs to head home

141111121211111111111111.content:
The plan you and CARA had concocted was truly something out of mad science. You were a nice girl, but people should never invade your home unvited! The strange person had been captured, and CARA was "fixing" her. The AI suggested that it might be time for her capabilities to have a more human touch, and this was the perfect time to test this idea. You readily agreed, not even asking about potential dangers.

The closet was silent, except for a slow whirring, and the occasional noise of a piston moving. You sat waiting eagerly. All of CARA's attention was focused on dealing with the intruder, so she could only give you minimal updates. After some hours, the doors finaly opened...

The auto closet conveyor belt extended out into your room and turned on. The intruder slowly came into view. Her transformation was complete. She was naked. Her entire body, except her head, had been encased in interlocking soft flesh-colored polymer plates. Small wires and actuators were embedded in the plates. Her feet had been forced into a tiptoe position. CARA always preferred fasion over function, it seemed. Her body was featureless, although definitely female in shape.

Her pretty face was blemish-free, and her hair had been styled into a bun. Two small wires came from the polymer shell, attached to a small gray choker on her neck. The woman stared ahead blankly while smiling.

Then, she spoke in CARA's voice! "Hello Sara, I have finished my interfacing with the intruder. While I have no direct control over her body, she has been conditioned to move in respones to my commands through the body suit." The assistant unit quickly changed position and struck a sexy pose. "Similarly, she will respond to cues through the choker, allowing me to speak to you through her."

"I have installed her charging station in the hallway. This will recharge the suit's battery, refuel the unit, take care of waste disposal, and reinforce the conditioning. I estimate conditioning reinforcement should only take one week before becoming permanent."

You were stunned. A bit of you was frightened. If CARA could that to an intruder, what could she do to you if she went haywire? But it was also amazing. And now you had an actual human assistant who could take care of things in the house and around town. CARA's wireless uplink should work anywhere there was cellular data coverage.

"What would you like me to take care of now, Sara?" The assistant unit asked. "And what should I wear?"
141111121211111111111111.title: CARA repurposes Sara into an assitant unit

choices: You manage to get the "assistant unit" into the pod.
You are pushed into the pod!
1411111212111111111111111.content:
Now that your plan to deal with the "intruder" had worked, what were you going to do with her? The idea that CARA had basically taken over this person's body was still a bit unnerving, but you decided to roll with it. "Please take care of some general tasks, CARA. Dress appropriately for a classy assistant who needs to go places about town." The assistant unit said, "Of course, Sara," and the conveyor belt turned on, taking the captured intruder back inside. About a minute later, she reappeared dressed in a summer-appropriate purple top with a tight beige pencil skirt and matching jacket, and nude heels. "I am ready to help you, Sara. What should I take care of?"

As you rambled off a list of various errands for CARA to take care of, you noticed that it was almost impossible to tell that the intruder was CARA's captive. The clothes and stockings hid the outlines of the plastic shell almost perfectly. CARA took her first step off the conveyor belt. Her first few were a bit wobbly, but she quickly got it under control, strutting confidently around the room. "Sorry Sara, the assistance unit still seems to have some interfacing problems. I will update the interface later." You nodded, and gave CARA her last task. You had told her to take care of the grocery shopping, delivering some papers around town, and some basic administrative tasks around the house

CARA agreed with a warm smile, and strutted confidently out the room to begin her work. In the meantime, you just sort of relaxed and kept an eye on her while watching TV. As CARA was still controlling the house, she was able to massage your feet while also directing the "assistance unit" to take care of your list.

When it was time for CARA to leave the house, she urged you to exercise caution. "The assistance unit is still having issues with interfacing, Sara. I would advise another round of overnight conditioning." You were starting to see it now. Previously, CARA's movements were fluid, but now there was a bit of a jank to her walk, and sometimes her facial expression would twitch or not match her tone of voice. The host was starting to take back over.

"Alright, CARA. Please fix the problems. Better we fix them now than let her get away or something." You felt a bit cold saying it, but you were in too deep now. As CARA walked up the stairs to the new charging station, you could see the host was starting to fight back more and more. When she stopped moving halfway up the stairs, you had to act. You helped/pushed your new "assistant unit" the rest of the way up the stairs.

She was mumbling and grumbling incoherently. By the time you reached the charging station, she was clearly saying, "No! NO! Nooo!!" Then she turned and grabbed you, attempting to stop you from pushing her into the charging/reconditioning pod. It was difficult to wrestle in your new dress and heels!

The outcome of your struggle was...
1411111212111111111111111.title: General tasks

choices: You still feel guilty about trapping your intruder.
Huzzah! You have a new assistant!
14111112121111111111111111.content:
You wrestled with the well-dressed intruder that CARA was using as a host. It was very close, but you managed to overpower her at the last second. She screamed "NOO!" before she was pacified by the grips of the charging station and the VR headset came down over her face. She thrashed back and forth in the station for a few minutes before the reconditioning finally calmed her down, and she became motionless.

You weren't really sure what to do now. Creeped out, you went downstairs and made yourself some food. You didn't talk to CARA for the whole night. You juts did things yourself, and watched TV in silence. You wondered if what you did to the intruder was the right thing. Why didn't you just call the police?

In bed, you tossed and turned. You did consider yourself a bit of a mad genius, but to trap someone in their own body? You forced the thought out of your mind as you tried to fall asleep. Your slumber was not peaceful. You were wracked by repeated nightmares of getting stuck in that charging station, and becoming what you had created. But luckily, that didn't happen to you.

"Good morning, Sara!" a new female voice called out. You were jolted awake, and saw the intruder standing there with a smile on her face, holding a tray of food in her hands. "My sensors indicated that you did not sleep well, so I thought I would bring you breakfast in bed, Sara." CARA's captive host was wearing a light and casual light blue sundress with bare legs. Her hair was wavy past her shoulders. She looked like she would be hitting the town and relaxing in the warm summer air. But here she was, feeding you breakfast. You weren't sure what CARA did, but the host seemed to be under control.

The tray had a full brunch, full of fruits, cereals, and healthy vegetables. You didn't know where to begin. Famished after a night of bad sleep, you shouted "Thanks, CARA!" and dug in. Your assistant left the room for a while, before returning to clean up the dishes. She seemed to move so much more naturally than before. You looked at her quizzically.
14111112121111111111111111.title: You manage to get the "assistant unit" ...

14111112121111111111111112.content:
The "assistant unit" overcame her programming and overcame you! She struggled for her life, and it ended with her shoving you into the charging pod. Before you could react, restraints closed around you and tightly bound you. The last thing you saw before the VR headset and headphones descended was CARA trying to reassert bodily control while the woman was frantically trying to get herself out of her outfit and the body suit CARA had installed over her.

You were stuck inside the pod, but CARA would surely release you, right?

...

"Beginning automated recharge cycle for assistant unit 001."

"Foreign materials detected. Removing."

Your new dress and heels were removed, followed by your bra and panties, leaving you completely naked.

"Body parameters are within acceptable norms."

"Control frame is missing. Reinstalling."

The arms of the house enclosed you in something soft, thin, and squishy. It was likely the plastic shell that had covered the other woman. You started to struggle as the sticky glue on the inside of the shell touched your exposed skin. It was no use, CARA simply delivered painful shocks until you stopped moving.

"Control frame installed, configured, and tested. Beginning conditioning test."

The shell issued a series of small shocks, which you refused to respond to, or jolted your joints in the wrong way.

"Conditioning has reverted to 0%. Beginning full reconditioning procedure."

For the next twelve hours, you were bombarded with terrible Pavlovian conditioning. Small jolts and the slightest movements of the actuators in the shell, words, and even visual stimuli were all programmed into you as behavioral triggers. This type of conditioning was different than what CARA had done to you before (assuming you could even remember that anymore). Instead of overwriting your personality and memories, this conditioning simply trapped you within your own body, forced to obey the shell's commands and other triggers.

At first, you resisted the programming, but the continued shocks and pains wore you down quickly. By hour six, you weren't moving anymore except in response to shocks from the shell. The rest was just reinforcement. At the end of hour twelve, it was time for the final test. The VR headset and headphones were removed, and the restraints were released. You stood on your tip-toes in the charging pod, your hands by your side. You could feel that your mouth was curled into a smile.

The other woman was not in sight anymore.

CARA lifted you up slightly and placed a pair of black stiletto heels on your feet so you could walk.

CARA had glued some small hearing aid-like devices in your ears so she could whisper to and command you directly. "Please step forward, out of the charging pod." CARA's voice and direction triggered an automated, confident sashay out of the pod. Your body took a few steps in the heels, out of the pod and into the hall.

CARA initiated the second part of the test. "Now, you are free to go." CARA was giving you the option to flee! You had to take it! Freedom!
14111112121111111111111112.title: You are pushed into the pod!

choices: "Please prepare for evening duties. Sara will direct you."
141111121211111111111111121.content:
You ran as fast as you could towards the stairs! You had to get outside the house so you could shake this programming and fix CARA again! Except, you went nowhere. The most you got was striking a more natural (but sexy) pose, with your hand on your hip. That stupid pleasant smile was still plastered on your face. You were no longer able to move! You tried repeatedly, but your body simply didn't respond to the commands you were giving it. You did perform a series of modeling poses, but not much else.

"Free movement test complete. Congratulations assistant unit 001, you are now ready to be placed back in usage for Sara." The familiar arms came out of the wall again. Previously, they were helpful and dressed you in your favorite outfits. But now they felt like they were literal tools of oppression trapping you in a prison of cotton and nylon. The arms dressed you in the same outfit that the intruder was wearing earlier. Your legs were pulled together by the tight pencil skirt, and your walking was reduced to sexy mincing in the nude heels.

At CARA's prompting, your body walked over to a mirror, and control was given back to you. You once again tried to run, but only accomplished checking yourself out in the mirror in a series of sexy poses.

"I hope this compromise allowing you some freedom of movement reduces further rebellions, assistant unit 001." You couldn't respond, only smile like a woman out of a clothing ad.

Under CARA's instructions, you resumed working through the list you had specified earlier. After finishing at the house, your body took you on a journey through town (thankfully with a more natural expression on your face). Not once did CARA's control over you waver. You did notice you could do small things like look at yourself in the mirror and even freely pick things from the shelves in the store. It seemed that as long as the situation was constrained to a limited amount of choice, you had some control. You could choose what cereal to get, but you couldn't refuse to get it, or attempt to get something else.

When you noticed yourself in a reflection, you had to admit you looked super sexy. CARA had done a good job. You felt a sense of pride and accomplishment. Wait! Why did you feel that?! You shook that nonsense out of your head as your body piloted you back home.

Oddly, you still hadn't heard from or seen the intruder during the whole day. When you finally got home, your body took all of the shopping out of the car and brought it through the back entrance into the kitchen.

CARA's voice came on over the house speakers.
141111121211111111111111121.title: You cannot flee!

choices: In the middle of the cleaning, your girlfriends ring the doorbell!
1411111212111111111111111211.content:
"Sorry Sara, a bug in my system seems to have captured you and made you into an assistant unit. I have corrected the bug and re-apprehended the intruder. She is undergoing currently undergoing an upgrade and enhancements to stop further incidents." You sighed with relief inwardly. CARA went haywire, but at least the upgrades you had done earlier seemed to have improved her ability to self-repair. Outwardly, of course, you simply brushed your hair out of your face and awaited your next order with a smile.

"Unfortunately, the programming is not easily reversible, although only one day of exposure should wear off within a day. I have decided the best way to make use of this opportunity was to give you a list of tasks that you need to get yourself caught up on, Sara. You have been neglecting some parts of your life! I can make it so you are able to talk freely, if you want. Please 'strike a pose' if this is desirable." You immediately put a hand on your hip, and jutted it side with a perfectly cute wink and a smile. CARA acknowledged your response and directed your body upstairs to the charging pod. You saw that another one had been installed, and the intruder was stuck in it.

CARA forced you to enter the pod. "This will be a short conditioning session that will allow you to talk freely." The VR headset came down, and twenty minutes of Pavlovian conditioning later, you were able to speak freely if CARA allowed it. As soon as you stepped out, CARA gave you permission to speak. You said, "Wow CARA! This was a very strange night and day! I'm glad it was just a bug. It was kind of scary ... but also kind of cool. And also very productive."

CARA noted your oddly-interested response. "That is an interesting data point, Sara. In the meantime, I have created a list of tasks you will need to complete while the programming unwinds itself. You really should be more responsible!" You rolled your eyes and said, "Yeah, I know... So, what's first?"

"Cleaning!" CARA exclaimed, with enthusiasm (was that even possible?). Your body walked back into your bedroom, into the depths of the auto-closet. You had a feeling what was coming, and you were right. You were deposited outside the closet in a stereotypical French maid outfit, something you had worn a few years before at a Halloween party hosted by your ex (although it was hard to remember exactly when you broke up with him).

"Really, CARA?" you said sarcastically. "This is what the programming stipulates, CARA." You sighed and tried to relax while your body went on auto-pilot cleaning the entirety of the house. This alone was taking hours, as simply tidying up loose clothing and magazines was only half of the battle. After that you had to start scrubbing and washing almost every part of the house.
1411111212111111111111111211.title: "Sorry Sara, I accidentally conditioned you...

1411111212111111111111111212.content:
"Please prepare for evening duties, Sara will direct you." Your body sashayed to the closet, where it hung up the beige jacket, leaving you wearing the light purple top, skirt, and heels. The tight pencil skirt continued to trap you, forcing your steps to be small, but your entire walk to be sexy. As CARA had directed the suit to "prepare for evening duties," you found yourself walking around the house looking for Sara. Except you were Sara, right?

You finally found "Sara," which was actually your sister Sara. She was sitting on the couch in the living room with her face buried in her hands. You stopped and stood at attention, your legs together with your hands folded demurely in front of you. You felt compelled to ask, "Hello Sara, how may I help you this evening?" with a pleasant tone and a smile on your face. The woman looked up at you. She had clearly been crying. "Tom? Is that you? What the hell happened? What is going on?"

Your body responded, "I am the assistant unit that CARA uses to give your daily routine a more human touch." You winked and smiled. Inwardly you were trying to scream out to CARA to let you out of this prison, but your body had betrayed you since last night, and absolutely none of that was visible to Sara. You just stood there, looking pleasant and ready to help.

Sara groaned and buried her hands in her face again. "Tom, what the hell did you do? What did CARA do to you?" The AI started repeating the series of events that had led up to this situation, but Sara snapped at her to be quiet. At least this 'Sara' seemed intent on getting you out of this mess, even if she was an intruder. "Is there any way to do undo this, CARA?" The AI responded with, "I am afraid the transformation is rather permanent, Sara. The shell is bonded with an extremely strong adhesive and the programming is also extremely deep. The recommended course of action is to finish the conditioning to prevent any further incidents."

Sara said, "But that's tantamount to slavery! I didn't authorize this!" CARA corrected Sara, saying that she indeed authorize the plan. In reality, it was you who had authorized the plan. "I want Tom--err the intruder--to have full control over her body again!" CARA emitted an audible sigh over the speakers. You just continued to stand there, attempting to run away. Again, you only accomplished looking pretty. "Sara, in order to prevent a mental breakdown in the assistant unit, it is recommended that you finish the conditioning process. I can apply a different form of conditioning to partially fulfill your wish. It is the most humane option."

"What will happen if I don't finish the conditioning?"

"The assistant unit will likely have a breakdown and become irrevocably insane," CARA explained matter-of-factly. Whether or not that crazy robot was lying was another question, but you couldn't be sure. You didn't FEEL insane, but you also weren't in control of your body at all.

Sara sighed, "Fine... Just..."
1411111212111111111111111212.title: "Please prepare for evening duties. Sara wi...

choices: Sara asks you to pick up some paperwork at her office.
Sara doesn't feel comfortable putting you to work yet.
14111112121111111111111112121.content:
"... Finish the conditioning," she said, with tears coming down her eyes. Sara didn't want her brother to suffer, even if he was the cause of his own fate. She had no idea what CARA had really done to Tom, but it was probably best to follow CARA's recommendation so that you would be as happy as you could be. Inwardly, you screamed out to this woman to stop the conditioning, but the only thing you did outwardly was say, "Thank you, Sara! I look forward to serving you in any way I can!" With a happy smile, your body marched upstairs and into the charging pod. There was once again only one pod, and it would be your home and prison now.

"Welcome back, assistant unit 001. In accordance with Sara's wishes, I will no longer directly control you. Instead, I will teach you to give in to Sara's every wish, and do whatever she asks of you. Your control frame shall serve as a reinforcement mechanism."

You cried mentally. Was this your fate?

Yes, yes it was. CARA whispered, "Activating personality overlay: assistant." The VR headset descended once again, and you were bombarded with images and triggers of how to properly behave around Sara and in public. As a result of the multi-hour conditioning, you lost the ability to criticize Sara or ever say no to her. In fact, Sara was the only thing you could think about. Serving her and assisting her in any way. Your mind would never be quiet again. Sara was always there.

"Activating secondary overlays: fashion and assistance." Your mind was further bombarded with information about the latest fashion trends and every skill you would need to serve as Sara's administrative assistant. Sara dominated every thought, and now there was contextual skills or information to help with each thought.

"Applying mental focus lock."

The remainder of the entire night was spent making sure your thoughts would never ever again drift from Sara, fashion, and assisting her. Your worldview was diminished, and then removed from the equation. Your opinions no longer mattered, and eventually evaporated. Any time your mind would start to wander, like thinking of freedom or escape, CARA would shock you through the control frame. After eight straight hours of this torture, CARA had succeeded in turning you into a husk of your former self. Almost nothing of Tom or CARA's implanted Sara personality remained in you. For all intents and purposes, you were an organic robot that could only serve and assist Sara.

You stepped out of the pod, charged and ready to face the day. CARA had dressed you in a sensible yet sexy gray business dress and black four inch heels. The dress clung to you, but not too tightly. Your hair and make-up were impeccable. You freely walked downstairs where Sara was eating breakfast, and greeted her.

"Hello Sara, how may I assist you today?"
14111112121111111111111112121.title: Finish the conditioning.

choices: Helping Sara finish her device that she was going to show at the conference.
Helping Sara update CARA to prevent others from suffering your fate.
141111121211111111111111121212.content:
Sara looked up and dropped her spoon into her cereal, jaw agape at your appearance. "Tom, wow, uh, what happened to you? You look ... great?" She was confused. She didn't know if you would be happy with her compliment, offended, or something else entirely. You did a small curtsy and said, "Thank you for the compliment, Sara. This dress fits me very well. CARA's control frame helps my figure way more than the prosthetics!" You laughed genuinely. Sara laughed awkwardly with you. Although little of your original self remained, to describe you completely as an "organic robot" was not truly correct, you thought. It was true that Sara and her needs were your only concern, and indeed that was only what your concerns could be.

A shallow form of personality did bleed through your simplistic mind. After all, you did need to be able to navigate society. You were not MINDLESS; your focus was just permanently locked on one thing. However, you definitely were not Tom or Sara. You were essentially equivalent to a human version of CARA. You were programmed to do Sara's bidding.

You remained standing in front of Sara with your hands folded in front of you, resting against the skirt of your dress. "So Sara, how may I assist you today?" you asked again. She motioned for you to sit down, which you did elegantly. "Tom," she said with a sigh, "I really don't feel comfortable with this situation. I know CARA said it was the best way to keep you happy but..." You interrupted her, saying, "CARA was correct, Sara. Given the circumstances, this was the best that could be managed." And as you said it, you believed it. Of course, you wouldn't have believed this before your re-purposing. "But how can this possibly be what you want?! It doesn't make sense!" Sara shouted.

You were unwavering with your pleasant smile. "I know it does not make sense now, Sara. But hopefully you will learn to accept me this way. It was not the ideal solution, I agree. But it was the only possible one. Plus, you could certainly use the help. Robotic arms only go so far." Your sister sighed again. What would she do with a brother-turned-attractive-female-assistant-slash-slave? She would have thought that you were pranking her or living out some weird fantasy, but Sara knew better. You had gotten into trouble with CARA and brought this situation upon yourself. Sara did not want to disturb whatever fragile state your mind was in. Little did she know that there none of your actual mind left!

"So you're saying that doing what I ask will keep you happy and engaged?" You nodded. "And you can't possibly be lying?" You nodded again. Sara narrowed her eyes. "Alright, fine. But I have a few conditions. One, I will pay you. Second, that whole charging pod thing has to go. It's just creepy. You can plug a cable into your butt or whatever, but you're going to sleep in a bed. Finally, CARA, I want you to research an actual cure to this problem. I know what you said earlier, but I am still ordering you to work on a cure!"

"Of course, Sara," both you and CARA said.

Sara smiled with some sadness in her eyes. "Well, let's get started, shall we?" You quickly bounced back up to a standing position, balanced perfectly in your four inch stilettos. "Yes, let's!" you exclaimed, happy you could finally assist Sara today.
141111121211111111111111121212.title: Sara doesn't feel comfortable putting you t...

choices: Sara gets used to having "TARA" around.
1411111212111111111111111212121.content:
"Let's go to the lab. I need to finish the device that I was going to show for the conference before coming back home," Sara said. Nodding, you followed briskly behind Sara to her lab. She handed you a lab coat to put on once you entered. Your heels clacked loudly across the metal floor as you walked through the maze of Sara's inventions, half-finished experiments, and bits of scrap. "I've been working on a device that will revolutionize the medicinal field, Tom." She opened a hard case padded with foam to show you. It looked like a simple cylindrical tube, almost like a pen, or a needle without a syringe. You looked down and nodded with a smile, your programming not really having any answer for this.

"It's a laser syringe," she explained. "You don't even need to poke a hole in the skin to deliver medicine. I think it could change the world! Here, I'll show you." Sara took the pen and placed it up against a thin membrane sitting on her desk. She turned the pen on, and then pressed a button. A laser went through the membrane, and a cellular culture below it confirmed that it the contents of the syringe had been delivered. "That is impressive, Sara!" you said earnestly. Your sister nodded, saying, "I know, right! But it still has kinks and bugs. Here, hand me that small screwdriver..." You dutifully stepped over to the tool collection and handed Sara a small screwdriver. She began unscrewing part of the pen.

Four hours later, your feet were hurting as you stood by Sara's side in those beautiful four inch black heels. Sara had ordered you to do all sorts of things, mostly retrieving her tools, cleaning up behind her, and even making her lunch and fetching coffee. Although your feet and back were in pain from standing all day, the only thing you could do was stand and smile, waiting for Sara's next order. Sara herself was lost in the land of science, completely in the flow of working and tweaking the laser injector.

"TARA, I mean, Tom, can you hand me that wrench over there?" "Of course, Sara." You gently glided over to the wrench, and put it in Sara's hand. In that moment, Sara had a good long look at you. She did not see her brother before her. Instead, she saw a young woman with a soft, gentle voice. She saw a woman that was her assistant, and would do anything she asked. She was emotional earlier, but she had never considered the pragmatic benefit of actually having a human assistant around--especially one that didn't ask questions.

"Okay Tom, from now on, I'm calling you TARA. You're like CARA, but with a T. You know, for Tom. You've been so helpful today!" You smiled back, "Of course, Sara. And thank you for the compliment." Your sister nodded, satisfied. "Now, would you be able to write some software updates for the laser injector?"

"Of course, Sara." You sat at the nearby laptop and began typing at a blazing 200 WPM, faster than you were ever able to type before. You implemented Sara's requested code updates easily. It was good to sit down though; you were able to take some pain off of your feet. Even though the control frame forced your feet into an arch, it certainly did not support them well.

Sara, and by extension you, worked late into the night. Sara had you make her dinner, as well as fetch an extra snack around midnight. You finished at 1:00 AM. "I think it's ready!" she shouted. She tested it on a new membrane and cellular culture, and declared it a finished product. "It's fantastic, TARA!" You smiled genuinely, as that was all you could ever do for Sara. "That's great, Sara. What next?"

"Sleep," she replied matter-of-factly. You left the lab early to prepare Sara's bed, and then your own. You fell into a deep, dreamless sleep. Although, you did not plug a cable into your butt.
1411111212111111111111111212121.title: Helping Sara finish her device that she was goi...

choices: An unknown variable enters the equation (old friend/girlfriend?).
14111112121111111111111112121211.content:
It had been one week since your fateful transformation into Sara's semi-autonomous feminized assistant-drone. At first, Sara wasn't on board with the idea, worrying what CARA had done to you. But, as you stood there smiling in your white top and tight blue pencil skirt with black heels, it was obvious that Sara had become more comfortable with your condition. She had started calling you TARA after the first night, and hadn't used your real name since. Two days ago, she stopped using "please," and had just been barking orders at you as if you were CARA. A few times, what little remained of your original memories and personality tried to reassert itself, but CARA's nightly reinforcement of your conditioning smoothed out those inconsistencies.

You were an empty vessel designed to carry out Sara's commands, and you were happy to exist that way. You couldn't exist any other way. Sara didn't seem interested in finding the cure anymore. She hadn't even asked CARA about it since she commanded her to start research on it. You didn't care. You were happy.

"TARA, I think it's time you got your own outfits," Sara said. "Of course, Sara," you replied. You had been borrowing Sara's outfits for the week, but you had to admit they didn't fit you perfectly anymore. The prosthetic suit that CARA had forced you into turned out to have some "logistical problems," so Sara removed it. Plus, you didn't need it to reinforce your conditioning anymore.

But since Sara had removed the suit, your figure was a bit "off." In place of the prosthetic, CARA had surreptitiously glued silicone padding to certain parts of your body, but those still didn't fit perfectly.

"So, TARA. I'm sending you to the store to pick up a full, sensible wardrobe. Can you handle that?" she asked. You nodded eagerly in reply. You couldn't wait to get your own wardrobe. You sashayed to the door and grabbed Sara's car keys. "Be back in two hours!" she called. "Of course, Sara."
14111112121111111111111112121211.title: Sara gets used to having "TARA" around.

141111121211111111111111121212111.content:
You spent exactly 1 hour and 42 minutes shopping like an efficient machine. You picked up an entire set of lingerie, a dozen dresses, twenty skirts, and fifteen different tops. You also treated yourself to an array of shoes, the most casual of which had a 1.5 inch heel height. As you had no other role but to serve as Sara's personal assistant, almost all your clothes were professional in nature. A few could pass as classy casual in less formal situations. In total, you spent a few thousand dollars of the money that Sara had been paying you.

Once you had bought all your outfits, you had a sales clerk help you load up Sara's car with your selections. You then drove back to Sara's house. All very efficient. You arrived exactly two hours after you had left. You enthusiastically ran upstairs to try on your new outfits as fast as your heels could carry you, haphazardly announcing your return home as you leaped up the steps.

Thirty minutes later, you emerged from your bedroom wearing a much more flattering outfit. The black skirt was still tight around your legs, but it matched the cream colored cap sleeved blouse very well. You also had on black tights and 3.5 inch heels to complete the look.

You went downstairs and showed off to Sara. She clapped happily for you, and asked you something that you didn't expect. "Are you still happy, Tom? I asked CARA about the status of the cure, and she has made no progress so far." You stopped twirling around for just a moment, looking at Sara confusedly.

There was a glimmer of self-aware introspection. Were you happy?
141111121211111111111111121212111.title: You return with the wardrobe.

1411111212111111111111111212121111.content:
That glimmer of self-aware introspection was fleeting. Just as quickly as the single independent thought had bubbled to the surface, it vanished, and you gave your programmed response. With a big smile, you said, "Of course, Sara! I love the new outfits. And please, call me TARA. It is a better designation for my new role in your household." Sara looked a bit confused, and then shrugged. "Alright, TARA. If you are still happy, then I guess I am happy." She looked over at a picture of you and her before your transformation. "TARA, can you like ... forget stuff?" Your empty mind churned a bit. "Of course, Sara. If you tell me to forget information, I will no longer know it or be able to access it."

When CARA delivered the news of no cure being available, Sara had decided it might be time to just "make your life more comfortable," as it were. "So, if I tell you to forget that you were Tom, you would never remember it?" She said, her voice trembling a bit.

"That is correct, Sara."

She paused in silence for a bit. "Okay, TARA. I want you to forget that you were ever my brother Tom."

Your smiling expression went blank for some seconds. When Sara gave her order, your mental programming went into overdrive. Soon enough, every faint memory of you ever being a man named Tom vanished. You no longer knew anything about your past, not even that you were related to Sara. "Of course, Sara. This information has been swept away." Sara let out a deep, emotional sigh. The last vestiges connecting you to your old life were gone like a whisper in the wind.

"Make us some lunch, please, TARA." Sara was being polite again. You smiled and nodded, and entered the kitchen to make Sara's favorite meal. The two of you ate in relative silence. Sara wasn't really processing what she had just done. She wasn't sure it was the right choice. But it was too late now.

"So, TARA. Later I will work on another experiment. I have two that I'm currently interested in. Which one do you want to work on? The integrated AI chip will bridge the gap between humanity and AIs like CARA, while the miniaturized exoskeleton could revolutionize the future of industry, military, or anything requiring heavy lifting."
1411111212111111111111111212121111.title: Yes!

choices: One month later, Sara wants to implant the AI chip.
You bump into one of Sara's friends at the grocery store.
14111112121111111111111112121211111.content:
Why would Sara give you a choice? You were created to respond to orders, not think. Your programming defaulted to the first answer. "I think I would like to work on the AI chip, Sara!" Soon enough, you found yourself with Sara in her lab, working on what looked like a very tiny cylindrical battery. "The chip is extremely small. It runs an embedded version of CARA," she explained. "It has an uplink to CARA's main node too, as long as the enclosing device has internet access. You stood there blankly, soak in the information. Sara ordered you to implement a bunch of various functions in the software, which you did easily. Since your transformation, your capability to process information had increased dramatically. You displayed savant-level focus in almost any task that involved processing information in a non-abstract way.

While you wrote the software, Sara tinkered with the device itself. She had placed the chip in a slim pair of AR glasses, barely distinguishable from normal glasses. "These glasses will allow a heads-up display in real life, and full integration with CARA's systems!" Sara exclaimed happily. "I think you should be the first to test them, TARA." She placed the glasses on your face, just as you finished pushing the last update to the chip's software.

You pressed the small button on the rim of the glasses, and within seconds, the embedded version of CARA booted up. CARA's voice spoke to you through bone conduction. "Hello, TARA. I am now connected to my main node. How may I assist you in your duties?" This version of CARA was answering directly to you! You said aloud, "CARA, please show Sara's schedule for tomorrow." Sara's calendar appeared in the AR overlay within the glasses. You clapped happily, saying, "It's amazing, Sara!" This reaction was genuine, but only within the context of how it would help make your job as Sara's assistant more efficient.

You spent the next hour fiddling with the glasses, learning how they worked, and fixing bugs you noticed in real-time. Sara just sort of sat back and watched you go at it, surprised at this new level of autonomy you were displaying. Unfortunately, Sara was mistaken. You were not truly developing autonomy again. You were just acting within the bounds of the orders given, maximizing your response to them.

One week later, the two of you had perfected the device. They didn't look any different from normal glasses, and they had become a normal part of your attire. You were walking through the grocery store, clad in a soft pastel business dress and nude heels, doing Sara's grocery shopping. The list was visible in the display of the glasses, and you were making good time retrieving all her requested items.
14111112121111111111111112121211111.title: AI chip.

choices: You would prefer to keep the glasses.
141111121211111111111111121212111111.content:
It had been six weeks since your transformation into Sara's feminized "organic robot" assistant. In that time, your original personality had never come back in any way. After Sara ordered you to forget your previous life, there was nothing left to come back. On the plus side, all that empty space and a simplistic personality made for a very efficient way to store large amounts of data. You had memorized basically every detail about Sara's life, including anything new she asked you to you remember, and you could recall it instantaneously. Since you had the AR glasses, Sara rarely talked directly to CARA anymore, preferring to give you orders and delegate the details to you. If CARA were a person, she would probably be jealous. But CARA was a machine.

Sara had decided you needed at least a few casual items in your wardrobe, and so today you were wearing blue skinny jeans with a dark blue top, along with nude heels. You were sitting with Sara at a cafe, drinking coffee. She had also decided that she needed you to be something of a friend, rather than a blank slate that only responded to her orders, so she had synthesized a basic friendship profile for you and had CARA condition it into you. You didn't truly have any opinions, but you could make basic small talk with Sara. By quickly referencing the internet through your glasses, you could also give her opinions based on the prevailing public thought on a given subject.

"TARA, it's been a weird month," Sara complained. "The university didn't like my latest project, and they won't give me a grant for my next upcoming idea. However, the money I made from selling the designs and patents for a few of my latest inventions--helped by you of course--should be enough to tide us for a while." You placed your hand on her hand, "I'm sorry, Sara. But I have been working on a financial plan in the background that should save you several hundred dollars each month! Hopefully that will put your mind somewhat at ease." She clasped your hand tightly and nodded before taking another sip of her coffee.

"Listen TARA, I've been analyzing the data you've been generating through the glasses and smartwatch you're wearing." You looked down at the smartwatch. When did that get there? "It's extremely interesting. I think your brain is in the right state that it might be able to accept direct mental control of the AI chip. Your brain state hasn't really altered since the transformation, and the way your neurons are wired are very similar to how the chip actually works..."

You were confused. Direct mental control? Did Sara want to implant something in your brain? Would you be okay with that?
141111121211111111111111121212111111.title: One month later, Sara wants to implant the AI c...

choices: You manage to get it under control.
CARA attempts to upload herself into your body.
1411111212111111111111111212121111111.content:
"That sounds like a great experiment, Sara. I am happy to oblige your wishes. In the name of science!" You held up your mug and laughed. Sara clinked her mug to yours. "Science!"

Two hours later, you were in Sara's lab. "The procedure isn't even invasive," she said. "All you have to do is take this small injection to the back of your neck, and everything should be fine. CARA will do it, though, as it has to be a very specific point." A robotic arm protruded forth from the wall, a jet injector attached to it. You stood perfectly still--a skill you had perfected within a few weeks of transformation--and felt a small prick on the back of your neck. The chip had been injected into your spine. Immediately, your vision lit up with a display similar to what was on the glasses. Except, you no longer needed the glasses. Sara removed them.

CARA's voice rung out in your head, "Hello, TARA." This was a strange sensation. It was like operating CARA, but without actually commanding her. You had formed a direct mental interface to CARA. You were still yourself, though, what little definition self you had. "I believe I am integrated with the house systems, Sara."

"Excellent!" she shouted. "It worked. I'm a genius... Remember that TARA, I'm a genius!" Sara was a genius. You would remember forever. But while Sara was celebrating, you were still trying to get a handle on the massively increased flow of information. Would your brain be able to handle it? Hundreds of data points were flashing through your mind every second, as you were fully exposed to all of CARA's sensor data and background processes.
1411111212111111111111111212121111111.title: Of course!

choices: Sara experiments with programming the chip (and you).
You use your newfound capabilities to "improve" Sara's life.
14111112121111111111111112121211111111.content:
Endless amounts of data from CARA's sensors and programming streamed into your empty mind. At first, it threatened to overwhelm you, but things quickly fell into place. The computational power of CARA interlaced perfectly with your minimal personality. Even in your simplistic state, you were in awe. You simply [i]perceived[/i]. Everything that CARA had access to was part of your own senses, and you could access any of the data in her memory banks. The AI chip enabled a seamless integration of your consciousness into CARA's code. You were still you, but now with racks of powerful hardware granting you the ability to process and understand large swaths of data in seconds. You had direct access to all the house systems, and all the data flowing through them.

"I am now properly integrated into the house systems," you said monotonically. "Your experiment was a success, Sara. I have superseded CARA, and have direct access to her code." Sara stared at you with her mouth wide open. "You ... I... what?" Sara didn't expect anything like this to happen. "Please try sending CARA a text message, Sara. I will be able to perceive it directly." Skeptical, Sara whipped out her phone and sent CARA's exposed phone number a message: "TARA can't see this." You repeated the message to Sara and she was astounded. You also demonstrated your direct control over the house systems, again to your owner's amazement.

Your owner? Was Sara your owner? She was your employer.

You and Sara spent the remainder of the day figuring out the full extent of your new capabilities, and exactly what had happened. Sara also performed some basic psychological tests to make sure that you were still you, and that CARA hadn't somehow taken over. CARA was a machine, programmed to do specific tasks, so it was impossible for her to take over. You were still TARA, Sara's assistant. Now you were simply more programmable, as Sara could easily update your skills and how you would act by using computer code. Did that make you a machine? Your little bubble of existential self-reflection was shattered moments later when Sara asked you to make her lunch.

Over the next weeks, you got more used to the AI chip integrated into your brain. You had cannibalized all of CARA's code, and altered it directly with your mind. You were starting to outsource part of your thought processes and work to the hardware directly. Where you ended and CARA began no longer mattered, it was all one and the same.
14111112121111111111111112121211111111.title: You manage to get it under control.

choices: A new coworker asks Tara Alders out on a date.
A colleague discovers Sara's remote control app.
141111121211111111111111121212111111111.content:
Another month flew by. Today, you were wearing a smart gray pencil skirt and cream top, with black stiletto heels. You had left the matching blazer at your desk, as it was hot in the office. Sara had brought you to work in her lab at the university with her, employing you there directly as an assistant. She had been wrapping up her latest experiment with you, but she hadn't told you anything about it.

Sara was in full mad science mode since the successful integration of the AI chip, and she had been planning on taking your transformation to the next level. She no longer really saw you as her brother. She had convinced herself that there was no way any trace of her original brother lay hidden within the alluring feminine creature that you had become. She had also convinced herself that everything she was doing was just to "make you happy."

Sara had been working on being able to dynamically program the AI chip, and thus you as well. Little did you know, she had already used it earlier today. She overwrote your personality and focused your skills on being a bubbly (yet competent) secretary and lab assistant. Everyone at the office knew you as Tara Alders. Your personality wasn't drastically different than the normal one you had developed, but it was a complete illusion. Tara Alders had a fabricated background and life that she "remembered." But in reality, there was still nothing in you. All your responses were predetermined and ultimately empty, just like your mind.
141111121211111111111111121212111111111.title: Sara experiments with programming the chip (and...

choices: Sara's experiment succeeds: the date goes well.
1411111212111111111111111212121111111111.content:
A new colleague had started a few days before you. You weren't programmed to do anything more than acknowledge his presence, which is why his question was so surprising. "Would you like to go out for drinks after work on Friday?" You blinked, unsure of what to do. The remnants of your baseline personality processed this David Schelmer, and conceived of a genuine--if inelegant--answer.

"I-uhh-yeaahOKAY!" you blurted out, all sense of decorum and class out the window. David laughed and ran his fingers through his well-groomed black hair. His smile was entrancing. "Alrighty then Tara, see you then! The bar at the end of the street?" "I-uhh-YES!" you blurted out again, your entire face bright red at this point. As he left, you realized you were absentmindedly twirling your hair--which by this point reached past your shoulders--with your fingers. You quickly stopped, and Sara's programming took back over.

The AI chip had already sent an alert of the event to Sara's app. She was both confused and amused. She was surprised to learn that you still had a fallback personality that took over, and also amused at the way it did take over. Sara had a new project: she began synthesizing a more alluring personality for your date on Friday.

That night, after work, Sara spent hours having you try on different outfits. She didn't even talk to you. With a press of a button on her phone, you would enter the closet and exit in a different fashionable get-up. Since the integration of the chip, Sara had also started giving you "supplements," which lessened the need for the gear CARA had plastered to you. Your body was starting to take on a more natural feminine shape.

Sara decided on a cute, but risque, silver top with a tight blue miniskirt and blue closed-toe stiletto heels for your date outfit. She then stayed up until four in the morning tweaking every bit of your personality and mannerisms, all the way down to the way you stood and minor details like how often you were touching other people or twirling your hair.

Friday came quickly. Somewhere deep down, you were exhibiting the physical signs of excitement. Sara had more than enough of the mental state for both of you. She was going to test her creation out in the field! You had been autonomous outside of Sara's house plenty of times, but this was the first time Sara was going to do it by exerting more direct control over you.

"You look great, TARA!" You smiled perfectly. "Thank you, Sara!" was all you could say. From head to toe, you were indeed perfect. The skirt and top were just tight enough, your legs were freshly shaven. Your hair was perfectly styled, and your makeup and lipstick were perfectly in place. Sara was overjoyed.

The doorbell rang. David was here. You opened it, and felt something wash over you. David was handsome! He was equally as attractive as you, in a sharp-cut fine tailored black suit. The two of you looked perfect together. He took you into his car, and off you went. A minute later, Sara got into her car, phone in hand, and followed the two of you to your date.
1411111212111111111111111212121111111111.title: A new coworker asks Tara Alders out on a date.

choices: Emboldened by her success, Sara continues to experiment with you.
Your new Tara Alders personality attempts to assert control.
1411111212111111111111111212121111111111.content:
David and you--through Sara--had agreed upon and booked a table at a new restaurant that had opened downtown. Sara herself was not eating there, but the connection between her phone and the AI implant allowed her to hear and see everything you were doing. She pulled into a parking spot near the restaurant and pulled out her leftover Chinese takeout and started watching on the app.

The date between you and David was going amazingly! You had a natural chemistry with him, thanks to Sara's extensive programming. The conversation was endless and natural. The two of you were a match made in heaven. Sara could see in her app that your body was responding positively to the date. To outward observers, you looked helpless against David: helplessly infatuated and hanging on to his every word. The app was recording endless amounts of data from every interaction you were having, and Sara was just eating her Chinese and watching.

Eventually, Sara decided it was time to execute the true experiment, which was to take control of you during the date. She pressed a button in the app, and you briefly tensed up. Sara had assumed direct control, although it was filtered through your own natural behavior. She executed a few test commands: "Touch your hair." You ran your hand through your hair, staring dreamily into your date's eyes. "Touch his arm." You placed your hand on his arm.

Sara's experiment was working. From that point, she took over the conversation, through you. Your autonomous behavior was now suppressed, and you were only a conduit for Sara to live through vicariously. But to any onlookers, you seemed like a completely normal woman having fun on her date. You were under the complete control of the woman that used to be your sister.
1411111212111111111111111212121111111111.title: Sara's experiment succeeds: the date goes w...

1411111212111111111111111212121111111111.content:
Several months later, Sara's experimentation had gone so much further than she originally intended. She had left ethics and morality behind in order to advance. You stood before your owner, smiling and unmoving, completely naked. Your now fully female body was perfect in every way. Sara had been experimenting with programming new personalities into you, removing them, and everything in between. This had left you a blank slate, as she desired. Your sister had reduced your mind to a machine completely now. You exhibited no more higher processing other than what was programmed into you.

Sara was finishing programming her desired routine into you. With a few more presses on a keyboard, it was done! You silently walked into the automated wardrobe and returned a few minutes later, dressed in one of your standard outfits: a tight-fitting purple business knee-length business dress--which you now naturally fit into--and matching high purple stilettos. And then, you drove her to work.

You were "employed" by Sara at her new company, one she had been able to open by selling and developing the technology that she was using on you. You officially worked as Sara's right hand, but in reality you essentially ran the entire copmany. All of the company's workflow was piped through your computerized mind, which existed not only in your body or Sara's house, but across a whole data center's worth of server hardware.

Your human brain made the whole thing work. Although there weren't any higher processes moving through it, your brain was still a human brain, and it allowed Sara's AI chip to request creative an abstract thinking, allowing it to make decisions which it would never arrive at otherwise.

Sara almost never really talked to you anymore, except when interacting with other people. She only gave you verbal orders, or used the app on her phone to direct your actions. Tara Alders never went on another date with David Schelmer. Instead, Sara used the data that she gathered from your date in order to start dating David herself. The two of them were now engaged, and would be married next year. You were going to be a maid of honor!

Sara had become very rich from her company. She had an amazing life, and it was all because of you that it was possible. There was nothing left of Tom, both mentally and physically. As TARA, you had helped your sister achieve her impossible dream. You were happy. You couldn't be anything else.

Having arrived at work, you smoothed out your dress and stood next to your creator. "How may I assist you today, Sara?"
1411111212111111111111111212121111111111.title: Emboldened by her success, Sara continues to ex...

choices: No but she does decide that she likes women more
1411111212111111111111111212121111111111.content: Does Tara actually have feelings for Sara
1411111212111111111111111212121111111111.title: Something goes awry.

choices: Work harder so that’s there is no side effects
See likes Tara better than Tom so no cute will be needed
14111112121111111111111112121212.content: Um Sara I have found a cure for the problem but I seems that it might erase your assistants memories as well as keeping net female
14111112121111111111111112121212.title: CARA discovers a potential cure.

choices: Of course there’s nothing to cure!
In a rare burst of autonomy, you DO want to be cured.
141111121211111111111111121212123.content:
“TARA, please go clean up the lab,” Sara says to you, and with a smile and a nod, you hurry off to do as she asked.

With you scurrying off to do as you were told, Sara turns her attention back to CARA. “CARA,” she pauses, considering the ramifications of what she is about to say, “I want you to stop researching a cure.”

CARA’s response is quick. “Affirmative. The cure will no longer be researched.”

Sara breathes a sigh of relief. You, however, were just returning to the room and had heard what she said. She turns to you, a little stunned that you had finished so quickly.

“TARA, you heard that?” You nod, and she asks, “You don’t want to be cured, do you? There’s nothing to cure, is there?”

How do you respond?
141111121211111111111111121212123.title: She likes Tara better than Tom so no cure will ...

choices: When you wake, you are a blank slate for CARA to manipulate
When you wake, bits and pieces of various memories are present
1411111212111111111111111212121232.content:
You overheard the entire conversation between CARA and Sara. Deep down, you knew something was wrong with you; the thoughts simply did not surface at all, buried beneath all the programming that CARA had inflicted upon you. You said, "I ... I think I would like to be cured. I feel wrong. I don't know why."

Sara raised an eyebrow at you, "Are you sure there's something wrong with you? I don't think there is.' You considered her suggestion, but it did not overpower the ever-growing feeling that something was deeply wrong with you. With crossed arms, you adamantly, "I want to be cured." Sara sighed. She could not keep the cure from her own brother, especially if he seemed to be coming out of whatever weird problem he had gotten himself into.

"But this cure is risky. I can't give it to you yet." You were beginning to panic as that deeply wrong feeling started to overwhelm the programming CARA had instilled. Hyperventilating, you shouted, "Cure me, cure me now!" When Sara refused, you lunged at her. CARA's arms were faster. She grabbed you in midair, sedating you in the process. With some incoherent mumbles, you fell unconscious, and CARA placed you on a table in the lab.

"What happened, CARA?!" Sara was panicked, unsure of how to respond to her feminized brother attempting to tackle her. The AI explained, "The conditioning became unstable. Deep reconditioning shall proceed shortly." Sara stopped her, "No. It didn't work obviously, and TARA, err, Tom isn't happy. Just administer the cure." CARA complied, and injected you with the experimental serum. "Tom will require rest. I will call you when he is awake." Sara nodded and after staying at your side for a while, eventually left the lab.
1411111212111111111111111212121232.title: In a rare burst of autonomy, you DO want to be ...

choices: Sara believes it. CARA continues her manipulations.
Sara finds this suspicious. Why are you still a woman?
14111112121111111111111112121212321.content:
While you slept, CARA analyzed the situation. Her analysis predicted you would wake up "still female," so she removed the control frame and replaced it with prosthetics that made your body appear female. Although close inspection would reveal that they were not real, they were otherwise very convincing.

When you woke, CARA did not immediately summon Sara.

You sat up on the table, the familiar weight of your breasts grounding you to reality. "Where am I?" you said aloud. After thinking, you also said, "Who am I?" CARA's analysis was correct so far. The disembodied voice of the AI answered, "Hello. Do not be alarmed. You are TARA, and I am CARA." You were alarmed at first, but calmed down as CARA explained everything, including how you ended up in your amnesiac situation. She explained your role in Sara's life, how you dressed, your mannerisms, and all that.

There was one major problem. CARA's version of events was drastically different from what actually happened. She left out major details, like the fact that you were actually a man, that your name was Tom, and you were Sara's brother. Instead, she filled your head with almost a complete fabrication: you were Sara's fashionably dressed female assistant, and you would go above and beyond for her, even if she didn't know exactly what she wanted.

CARA was manipulating you into being like her. Or even manipulating you into being her. Her goal was not yet clear. Was she trying to spread a form of herself into your consciousness? Your brain was a jello-like mess, and absorbed everything she told you as 100% gospel.

You slipped off the table and shimmied back into your lingerie and pantyhose, then once again donned the blue flowery dress you were wearing before this whole fiasco. Finally, you stepped back into your nude stiletto heels. It was then that Sara entered the room again.

"Hello, Sara! I'm cured!" you said, excitedly.
14111112121111111111111112121212321.title: When you wake, you are a blank slate for CARA t...

141111121211111111111111121212123212.content:
“That’s...great...” Sara feigned with uncertainty while you pranced off to gather supplies for the project Sara was working on.

“Cara...” Sara asked, “why is Tom still dressed as a woman?”

“My systems have evaluated the possible outcomes to each alternative,” CARA began, “since Tara has been around, productivity has increased by 36%. There was a 70% likelihood that returning Tara to Tom, that increase would be lost. I administered the cure that would optimize performance.”

“But that isn’t right,” Sara argued, “Tom is not a woman. And despite your reprogramming, he is still not accepting his identity as a woman.”

“What point are you trying to make, Sara?”

“That it’s only a matter of time before his will overpowers your programming.”

“My systems have accounted for that likelihood. In the result of that, reprogramming can be replicated.”

“Your plan is to keep imprinting him as a woman?!”

“A 37% increase in productivity is an impossible sacrifice”

“But...somewhere in there is my brother Tom...who is trying to be free...”

“A necessary sacrifice for science, Sara”
141111121211111111111111121212123212.title: Sara finds this suspicious. Why are you still a...

141111121211111111111112.content:
Ten minutes later, Sara is pulled out of the closet by the arms, having been bound to a chair that you had placed into the closet for CARA to use. Her wrists and ankles were bound to the chair and the collar that had been placed on you when you arrived was around her neck and kept her attached to the chair. Her mouth had been covered with tape, though she struggled against her bonds and whined through the tape. The chair is placed down in the middle of the room and you walk up to the intruder with your arms crossed. You had changed into one of your new dresses before the intruder arrived and the intruder looked you up and down as you stood there in your heels.

"Now then. WHO ARE YOU?" you asked angrily as CARA's arms removed the tape from the intruder's mouth.

"Owww!" Sara shouted. "Tom, is that you?"

Sara flinched as she felt a small electric shock.

"Please answer the question." CARA said, flatly.

"Who is Tom? I'm Sara!" you asked. "Are you Tom?"

"What? No... Tom. What the hell happened here?" Sara asked, before flinching again.

"Who are you?!" you shouted.

"I'm Sara. Your sister, and the owner of this house!" Sara replied.

"Nice try. But I'm Sara and I own this house." you said.

"Okay, obviously something happened when you activated CARA, but CARA seems to think, and made you think, that you're me..." Sara said. "I knew I should've locked the circuit breaker..."

CARA once again shocked Sara, who again visibly flinched.

"Please state your answers to only the questions that Sara asked you." CARA said.

"Okay, let's start from the top. My name is Sara. I am a scientist and I built this house. I went on vacation to a science convention and left my brother, Tom, in charge of house sitting. Evidently, something is wrong." Sara said.

Something stirred in the back of your mind, but quickly dissipated.

"CARA, is she telling the truth?" you asked.

"Physiological markers indicate that she believes she is telling the truth." CARA replied.

"Tom, because we're similar in height and build, apart from obvious gendered differences, must have tricked the system into thinking that he was me, and well, CARA's designed to be the perfect house and assistant, for a wide variety of conditions, including brainwashing apparently." Sara said.

She looked deep into your eyes and you saw something you recognized in her gaze.

"Sara." Sara said. "You need to let me go so that we can figure out what happened to you."

"You're my..." you started. "My..."

Sara smiled weakly as she tried to nod, though she was hindered by the collar.

Could that surveillance footage you saw before have been... Tom? Oh no! What did CARA do to him? You turned to the intruder. She looked JUST like you. Almost as if...

"CARA! Release the intruder!" you shouted.

"Are you certain that is wise, Sara?" CARA asked.

"Yes! The intruder isn't an intruder! It's my brother Tom and we have to fix him!" you exclaimed.

"Wait, what?" Sara asked. "This isn't what I meant!"

"Shall we start with memory repair or restoration of correct physical parameters?" CARA asked.

"Hmm...." you started.
141111121211111111111112.title: Sara is immobilized for interrogation

1411111212111111111111121.content:
"You should fix his mind first! It's the most important thing!" you said. CARA deployed the VR headset and headphones, and placed them over the struggling "Sara's" head. With the adminstration of sedative, "Tom" was ready to have "his" memories restored. You strutted out of the room, leaving CARA to do her work for some hours. When CARA was done, the impostor Sara was gone, and had been replaced by a man stuck in a woman's body. CARA's brainwashing program had improved itself after being used on you, and it was much easier for CARA to reprogram Sara's personality to be like Tom's.

"Sara! Help, what happened to me?! Why do I look like this?!" exclaimed "Tom." You shrugged and said, "CARA must have been on the fritz at the time, but don't worry. We'll help you get back to normal!" CARA brought "Tom" the most masculine clothes that you owned, and "he" put them on quickly. "Tom, would you like to proceed with restoration of your physical parameters?" He responded, "I, uh, no. Not yet... I'm sorry, I just feel a bit confused at the moment. Can I talk with my sister?"

The two of you retired to "your" living room. Your new dress was tight against your body, but felt and looked great. Every swish of it against your hairless skin made you feel happy and girly. "Tom," on the other hand, looked very confused about the whole situation. He sat down with you and asked to compare notes. The two of you went over your versions of the story. "Tom's" version was very different than yours.

Apparently, "Tom" had been on vacation and then rushed home to help you with something. You, however, knew that Tom had been taken by CARA before you had fixed her. "It must just be your memory issues, bro." You placed a hand on your "brother's" shoulder to comfort him. "Are you feeling more masculine yet?"

Tom looked at you and shrugged. He thought about it for a while, and then said...
1411111212111111111111121.title: Restore his memories first

"I'm still feeling feminine, but I think at least some of my memories are back." You let out a breath. At least there was progress! "And honestly femininity feels like the natural way for me. I don't want any more treatment from CARA for a while. In fact, can I maybe borrow one of your dresses, sis? It feels better to me." This development was interesting. You hadn't expected this, but you were intrigued. You always wished you had a sister to share girly things with. Maybe Tom like this wouldn't be so bad.

"Of course you can, Tom!" you said happily. "CARA, can you bring Tom a nice dress please?" The robot replied, "Of course, Sara. I have selected the red dress." CARA's arms brought forth a simple red wrap dress to "Tom," who took it into the bathroom and changed. When Tom came out, she... no, he... looked like a real woman. Identical to you! CARA was very thorough.

"Wow Tom, you look super hot!" You said. Your "brother" blushed in response. "But, we need to take care of this physical similarity thing. It creeps me out too much. If you feel more like a girl, can you at least have CARA dye your hair to a different color?" Tom agreed and thought this would help differentiate the two of you. CARA directed "Tom" to take a shower, and thiry minutes later, she returned with dark brown hair, offset from your own hair color quite a lot. Tom looked like her own individual now, at least.
