141111121211112.content:
You walked up to the table, swinging your purse off your shoulder, plunking it down, and then sliding into the booth, crossing your legs femininely as you did so. "Hey girls! Sorry I'm a bit late," you said cheerfully. They just stared at you. "Uhh..." The three of them stared at each other before staring at you. "Tom? Is that you?" You said, "Tom? No, it's Sara!" You laughed. The girls were always funny. "Um. You're definitely -NOT- Sara," Maria said. You wondered what was going on. Your friends seemed very uncomfortable with this situation. Of course! They must be thinking about your sister, who was also named Sara. Why did your parents name both of you the same?

You smiled, saying, "Well, DUH Maria. Of course I'm not my sister. She's on vacation." The waiter came by and delivered four cups of coffee. You took yours, something light brown and creamy with so many extra ingredients that it probably couldn't legally be classified as coffee. The others took their coffees. Toni seemed to be the most disturbed of the trio. "I can't even ... what is this? Did you lose a really huge bet with Sara?" You were still confused, but something welling up in you was telling you that something about this whole situation--especially something about you--was not right.

Sara's friends had never liked Tom. He was always mean to them growing up, and frankly they saw him as a bit of a douche bag. So what they saw before them now was very strange and confusing. It was definitely Tom, but the only way they could tell was because they had known him for years. To anyone else--even a bit to the girls--he looked and acted like an attractive young woman.

Toni said, "Please 'Sara,' tell us what's going on." Toni had unintentionally triggered the phrase that CARA had embedded in you. Immediately, almost robotically, you spilled out the entire story about how CARA had transformed you to your current state. After that, Sara's programming took back over, leaving you more confused. You just wanted to hang out with your girlfriends, and they were all staring at you like you were insane.
141111121211112.title: They recognize you as Tom, Sara's brother

choices: Program you as their new friend
Program you as their new servant
1411111212111121.content:
The trio whispered among themselves: "Did you see how she--he reacted when you said 'Please Sara?'", "Why is he acting so strangely?", "Should we call his sister?" You sat there sipping on your coffee for a while before interrupting them. "Girls? What's up?" You smiled nervously. They looked at you with a mix of mischief, confusion, and fear. Maria said, "Please Sara, could you clean up the coffee for us?" The programming took over again, and you happily nodded. You stood up, cleaned up the entire table, and sashayed over to the trash with the empty cups.

Returning to the table, you picked up your purse and said, "Where to next, girls?" Maria suggested shopping, and everyone was enthusiastic. The shopping trip resulted in you seeming to carry all the bags, as your friends had asked you so politely! "Please, Sara, would you carry my bag?" You had to oblige. You felt a bit like you were trapped in your own body, as it seemed to be doing things you wouldn't otherwise be doing if your friends had not asked. But it was okay, they were nice enough, and you were having a good time.

Eventually the shopping ended, and you were dragging a hoard of bags around. It was getting impractical to carry them. Luckily, your friends decided they were done, and you helped them load everything into their cars. Your friends discussed among themselves. "We can't leave her--ehh him like this," Maria said. "Why not? It was so nice not having to carry around all those bags!" said Donna. "Maria is right. We can't leave him thinking he is Sara, but that doesn't mean we have to give up our new, uh, friend," Toni mused.

The three "suggested" you return to Sara's house to continue hanging out. Of course you obliged, and soon the four of you were at Sara's house. CARA recognized Toni, Donna, and Maria when you entered. Toni said, "Hi CARA, we would like to fix Tom here. I'm not sure what happened." CARA replied flatly, "Sorry, Sara's brother Tom is not here." Toni rolled her eyes and groaned, "Well that might explain this whole situation. CARA seems to be on the fritz. I'll go fix her." Toni was almost as smart as Sara.

She went over to CARA's main box and started crossing wires around. "So girls, what should we do with 'Sara' here? Tom was always a bit of an asshole, you know?" Toni said. "Yeah, I like her better like this!" chirped Maria.
1411111212111121.title: They figure out "Please Sara"

14111112121111211.content:
"It's cruel to keep her like she is. But she's also so much nicer like this," said Donna. The other two agreed, and Toni crossed the final wires. "CARA, would you please fix Tom here, but keep all the good parts we've discovered about her today intact?" Toni had removed most of CARA's protections against manual activation of her more dangerous implements. CARA responded, "Of course Toni. I will have her ready in a few hours. Please Sara, come to your closet." You followed CARA's request and hypnotically walked up the stairs away from the girls. CARA told them, "In the meantime, please enjoy some light refreshments and make yourselves comfortable."

Upstairs, CARA's arms pulled you into the closet. You were confused, "CARA, what are you doing? I command you to stop!" The house was silent as it guided you to a chair and forced you into it, with restraints. "I am sorry, Sara. Toni has corrected a flaw in my programming, and now I will correct the flaws in yours." You struggled in vain as the VR headset and headphones descended from the ceiling once again. They were forced onto you, and the barrage of subliminal messaging and imagery started again. You had already been hypnotized by CARA twice before, so on the third time you went under immediately.

CARA's hypnosis started changing your memories further and further. Your new identity was distilled from both Tom's and Sara's memories. In order to keep your mind sane, CARA did not try to heavily alter your past to that of a woman. Instead, she started overwriting how you perceived the world, and how you thought people perceived you. Although your given name was Tom, you generally went by Tara. You were definitely male, but you always had a great body, and almost always dressed in women's clothing. The prosthetics just helped with filling out your dresses and tops. Gender identity was of no real concern to you, but you knew that almost everyone perceived you as a woman. That was fine.

She also altered your memories of your interaction's with Sara's friends. No longer did you remember them as your sister's lame friends, but rather your closest girlfriends in the whole world!

The remaining hypnosis smoothed over inconsistencies and made sure your femininity was kept intact. CARA also changed your phone around again. Your contacts were a distilled set of those between Sara's and your own.

Finally, CARA removed the headset, and asked, "How are you feeling, Tara?"
14111112121111211.title: Program you as their new friend

You let out an ear piercing scream as your mind tried to figure out what was happening. CARA tried, fruitlessly to calm you down but nothing was working. Giving up CARA tried to reactivate the VR Headset. Looking up you saw the headset start to descend, you screeched in fear- instead of pain.

You may not have a clue about who you are but you do remember one very important thing: The Headset only brings pain. "Tom!"
"Sara!"

Toni just stared into the distance, compeltly in shock.

"Of course his dead! Did you not see what just happend!" Maria snapped.

Your dread grows as you realize CARA is quite serious about wanting you to find a man to ravish you - and a deep, deep chill overcomes you as, involuntarily, you (very, very briefly) wonder how much of a pleasurable stimulus she'd give you for that.

You have to escape from here. Unfortunately, CARA has, for the moment, locked you into her VR simulation - or rather, you technically let her do it.
